The main challenge he has faced is to the total loss of products as a result of the heavy rains that have affected a large part of the country. His plants have deteriorated and have not been able to develop. Thanks to his harvest of beans, José has been able to submit his payments on time and maintain his loan.

However, he is running out of money required for him to continue working his land. This is the source of financial income by which he is able to maintain his family. He needs support so that he can buy fertilizers and supplies to restore his cassava crop and help his family move forward.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and farming supplies.

loans.name: Yesero

texts.en: Yesero is a 37-year-old married man with four children living in Hoima, Uganda. For 15 years, he has been a farmer and this has helped him to support his family. His major challenge is inadequate capital to purchase modern farming equipment and his dream is to hire employees to help him expand his garden. Yesero needs the loan facility to buy rice, groundnuts and maize for planting.

loans.use: to buy rice, groundnuts and maize for planting.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace used her last loan to buy clothes for resale. However, she faces challenges of price fluctuations, inflation, and customers not paying on time. Her dream is to educate her child and expand her business into a renowned boutique in town. Grace needs this loan to buy clothes for resale.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Itaifafo

texts.en:
Itaifafo is 49 years old.  She is married and has six children.

Itaifafo owns and operates a business venture, planting and harvesting taro to sell.  She has three years of experience in this business.  Itaifafo is requesting a loan of 1,700 WST to purchase land to raise additional crops.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 700 WST or $292 per week) to improve her family’s general living conditions.

In 2009, Itaifafo joined SPBD in order to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Itaifafo's third loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase land to raise additional crops.

loans.name: Faaiuga

texts.en:
Faaiuga is 34 years old and married with four children.

Faaiuga owns and operates a business venture planting and harvesting taro for sale. She has four years of experience in this business.    

Faaiuga needs a loan of WST 1,500 to purchase harvesting equipment such as knives and wheelbarrow. She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be $125 per week) to improve and expand the business.

Faaiuga joined SPBD to gain access to financial services. Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks because they lack collateral. This is Faaiuga's fourth loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase harvesting equipment such as knives, wheelbarrow.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en: Jennifer is a forty-two-year-old hardworking mother of two children living in Masindi, Uganda. She has been selling produce for six years and this has helped her to support her family. Her major challenge is the seasonal nature of the business and her dream is to diversify and trade in coffee and maize. Jennifer needs the loan facility to buy beans and groundnuts to sell.

loans.use: to buy groundnuts and beans to sell.

loans.name: Evans

texts.en:
Evans is forty-one years old, married, and with three children. He distributes water to earn a living. He has been in the business for three years and describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for a loan of 30,000 Kenya Shillings to buy water pipes and a water tank.

loans.use: to buy water pipes and a water tank.

loans.name: Svetlana

texts.en:
Svetlana owns a retail business that sells cosmetics and perfumes at the central market in Belaya Tserkov. She has been operating this business for 14 years. Svetlana started this business when her husband left her. Due to her business Svetlana was able to raise her three children. Now, as they have grown up and left home, she continues to help them. 

Svetlana’s business also grew. Today Svetlana has one employee and many loyal customers. Svetlana would like to borrow 20,000 UAH to purchase more inventory. She hopes to increase her business's sales and receive additional income. Svetlana’s goal is to complete building a small house outside the town. She is doing the finishing work now.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and perfumes for her inventory.

loans.name: Faatoaga

texts.en:
Faatoaga is forty-three years of age and is married with six children.

Faatoaga owns & operates a business venture raising pigs for sale.  She has three years of experience in this business.    Faatoaga needs a loan of WST $1,000 to build a secured fence to keep the animals safe.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 500 talas or US $208 per week) to improve/expand the business.

Faatoaga joined SPBD to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Faatoaga's 3rd loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to build a secured fence to keep the animals safe.

loans.name: Sunema

texts.en:
Sunema is 44 years of age and she the single mother of one child.

Sunema owns and operates a business planting and harvesting taro for sale.  She has two years of experience in this business. Sunema needs a loan of WST $1,000 in order to purchase chemicals such as gramoxome.  She plans to use the profit from her business (estimated to be 300 talas or US $125 per week) to improve/expand the business.

Sunema joined Kiva partner SPBD in order to gain access to financial services.  Most of SPBD's clients are unable to borrow from commercial banks, because they lack collateral.  This is Sunema's second loan with SPBD.

loans.use: to purchase chemicals such as gramoxome

loans.name: Zenith Grace

texts.en:
Zenith Grace is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children.Zenith Grace has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for five years. 

Zenith Grace has requested a loan of 10,000 PHP to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Zenith Grace hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Béatrice

texts.fr:
Béatrice  est née au Rwanda. Elle a 38 ans et elle est veuve avec 3 enfants de 12 à 18 ans, dont 3 scolarisés. Il a 2 personnes dans son charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 8 ans de primaire.

Béatrice est commerçante. C’est son deuxième cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des tissu pour les femmes et hommes et d’autres matériels de couture.

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d’augmenter son capital pour avoir des machines à coudre moderne. Dans les prochaines années, Béatrice voudrait avoir son propre atelier de couture avec des machines moderne. Avec les profits, elle prévoit  de scolariser ses enfants jusqu’au haute niveau et améliore le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en:
Beatrice was born in Rwanda.  She is a 38 year old widow with three children between the ages of 12 and 18, all of whom attend school.  She has eight years of primary school education. 

Beatrice is a businesswoman.  This is her second loan with ACB.  She is going to use her loan to buy fabric for men and women and other sewing supplies. 

Her strategy for growing her business is to increase her capital and buy modern sewing machines.  In the coming years, Beatrice would like to have her own sewing shop with modern machines. With her profits, she foresees being able to send her children on to a higher level of schooling and to improve the quality of life for her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric for men and women and other sewing supplies.

loans.name: José Ramon

texts.es: José de 48 años de edad vive al norte de la ciudad, con su esposa y su hijo de 4 años de edad; allí se dedica al oficio de artes gráficas, sus principales productos son los volantes, pendones avisos, sellos, almanaques entre otros, apoyado por su esposa quien conoce la tecnología de la informática y se ha desempeñado también, en este arte que emprendió con su cónyuge desde hace 12 años, después que  José trabajó en la microempresa de su cuñado, adquirió toda su experiencia y de allí  nació su idea de trabajar independiente. Con este conocimiento poco a poco adquirió sus propios materiales y se dispuso a conseguir clientes propios, aprovechando que realiza otra actividad simultánea en la que viaja por todo el país, donde ha abierto nuevos mercados, como en Neiva, Bogotá, Honda, Ocaña, Santa Marta y Ciénaga en el departamento del Magdalena. Sus clientes, son las tiendas, almacenes, vendedores particulares, salas de belleza y muchos negocios que requieren hacer publicidad, empaste u otros diseños. En su negocio trabaja con el 50% del anticipo  y compra sus materiales de contado, por eso en sus inventarios tiene tintas, sellos,  papel adhesivo, papel bond, empaques plásticos   y de todo un poco, para responder a su demanda. En su  proceso utiliza el computador para hacer los diseños y contrata la impresión, o encuadernación,  cortado, entre otras partes de él  y por ello requiere tener efectivo disponible para la contratación de terceros, esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el tendrá un fondo de efectivo  y comprará algunos materiales como sellos papel adhesivos, papel bond etc.  José adicionalmente genera otros ingresos por concepto de venta de productos naturales. Su principal deseo es lograr el equilibrio entre lo material y lo espiritual para sacar adelante a su familia, siendo un mejor ser humano, por eso su mayor desafío  es lograr su superación personal que lo lleve al logro esperado.
texts.en: José is 48 years old and lives in the northern part of the city of Cartagena with his wife and 4 year old son. He works as a graphic designer; he mostly makes fliers, banners, stamps, calendars and other items. José helps his wife who knows computer science and works in the same field. They learned together some 12 years ago when José worked in his brother-in-laws’ small company where he gained experience and got the idea to start his own business. Little by little he got materials and customers taking advantage of his other work that allows him to travel all over the country where he has opened new markets in cities like Neiva, Bogotá, Honda, Ocaña, Santa Marta and Ciénaga in the Magdalena department. José’s customers include retail stores, grocery stores, salespeople, beauty parlors and many other businesses that need publicity, bookbinding and other designs. In his business he works with 50% in advance, he buys the materials cash down and this is why he has in his inventory dyes, stamps, adhesive paper, bond paper, plastic wrap and a little bit of everything to meet his customers’ demands. José uses the computer to make the designs and hires out the printing, bookbinding or cutting which is why he needs to have some cash on hand when he needs to hire another service. This is his first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo to have some cash and to buy materials like stamps, paper adhesives, bond paper, etc. José also needs the money for his other business which is selling natural products. His biggest dream is to have a balance between his material and spiritual life, to get his family ahead, to be a better person. He says that his biggest challenge is his personal development which will help him achieve his dreams.

loans.use: buy materials like stamps, adhesive paper, bond paper and to hire out some services.

loans.name: Amath

texts.fr: L'emprunteur est un jeune célibataire qui vit avec ses deux parents.Il exerce le transport en motocyclette de voyageurs dans sa localité.Son activité lui permet de subvenir à ses propres besoins et de soutenir sa famille dans la prise en charge des dépenses d'alimentation et de santé. Pour améliorer ses revenus, il sollicite un pret de 400000f afin d'acquérir sa propre moto.Son ambition est d'acheter cinq motos pour les mettre dans la circulation.
texts.en: The borrower is a young single man, who lives with his parents.  He is involved in the local transport of passengers on his motorcycle.  This activity allows him to take care of his own needs and to help his family pay for food and healthcare costs.  In order to increase his income, he is requesting a loan of 400,000 francs which will be used to buy his own motorcycle.  His ambition is to buy five motorcycles to put them into circulation.

loans.use: to buy his own motorcycle.

loans.name: Bozorkul

texts.ru: Бозоркул проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 46 лет. Он женат. У него пятеро детей. Бозоркул имеет высшее медицинское образование. По профессии он проработал восемь лет. Кроме того Бозоркул занимается торговлей. У него имеется магазин со смешанным ассортиментом товара. В этой области он 7 лет. Кредит берет для покупки продуктов питания и теплых свитеров.
texts.en: Bozorkul lives in the region of Dangara. He is 46 years old. He is married and has five children. Bozorkul has a medical education and has worked in the profession for eight years. Bozorkul has also done retail. He has own store with a mixed variety of merchandise. He has been in this business for seven years. He is taking out the loan to buy food and warm sweaters.

loans.use: to purchase food and warm sweaters.

loans.name: Shabiston

texts.ru: Шабистон проживает в районе Джиликул. Ей 46 лет. Она замужем. Шабистон имеет среднее образование. Она занимается растениеводством. В основном она выращивает овощи для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Shabiston lives in the region of Jilikul. She is 46 years, she is married. Shabiston has secondary education. She does agriculture. She mainly cultivates vegetables for future resale. She is taking out the loan to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Qutbiya

texts.ru: Кутбия жительница района Джиликул. Ей 47 лет. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Она занимается растениеводством. В этой области она 29 лет. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Qutbiya is a resident of the region of Jilikul. She is 47 years old, married and has two children. She cultivates crops. She has been in this business for 29 years. Qutbiya is taking out the loan to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Nurali

texts.ru: Нурали житель района Джиликул. Ему 47 лет. Он женат. У него трое детей. Двое его детей находятся на заработках в Российской Федерации. Сам он имеет среднее образование. Он более 30 лет занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Nurali is a resident of the Jilikul region. He is 47 years old, married and has three children. Two of his children are now working in the Russian Federation. Nurali has secondary education. He has been cultivating crops for more than thirty years. He is taking out the loan to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Dilafruz

texts.ru: Дилафруз проживает в районе Джиликул. Ей 31 год. Она замужем. У нее один ребенок. Она занимается животноводством. В основном она закупает скот в дальнейшем для продажи. Кредит берет для закупа телят.
texts.en: Dilarfuz lives in the Jilikul region. She is 31 years old. She is married and has one child. She does animal husbandry. Dilafruz mainly buys cattle for resale in the future. She is taking out the loan to buy calves.

loans.use: to buy calves.

loans.name: Mwanamisi

texts.en:
Mwanamisi is applying for another loan to expand her existing business. She will use this 45,000 Kes loan to purchase more stocks of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and beans for her business. In the future, Mwanamisi aspires to continue improving her business. 

Since taking her last Kiva loan, Mwanamisi has greatly improved her family’s standard of living. She hopes to continue accessing the financial services offered by Yehu and Kiva lenders and thanks you for your support!

loans.use: To purchase more stocks of wheat flour, maize flour, rice and beans for her food stall

loans.name: Hadija

texts.en:
Hadija is a 31-year-old divorced woman with one child who is enrolled in school. She owns a house with electricity but no piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food for her family and school fees for her child. 

Hadija has operated a retail shop for the past 7 years; her potential customers are the local community members. She faces a major challenge of seasonality. She dreams of expanding her business.

With the Kshs 40,000 she wants to purchase more maize flour, wheat flour, rice, sugar and cooking oil for resale. She decided to join Yehu to access funds to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase more maize flour, wheat flour, rice, sugar and cooking oil for resale.

loans.name: Dalmas

texts.en: Dalmas is taking out another Kiva loan of 40,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES) to boost his goat meat business. With the loan, he wants to purchase goats and a cow for meat sales. With the additional profit from the last loan, he added more goats which enabled him to earn more profit in the business. He dreams of becoming a wholesale supplier of goats in the future. Thanks to Kiva lenders and Yehu for providing an opportunity to improve his living standards.

loans.use: to purchase goats and a cow for meat sale.

loans.name: Kurbonazar

texts.ru: Курбоназар добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и любящий отец троих детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 7 лет Курбоназар занимается купле- продажей хозяйственных товаров. Имеет магазин и много постоянных клиентов. Курбоназар хотел бы получить займ в размере 12000 Сомони для покупки товаров с целью расширения бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Kurbonazar is a kind and hardworking person.  He is married and is a loving father of three children.  His wife is involved in household work.  Kurbonazar has been involved in buying and selling household goods for over seven years.  He has a store and many regular customers.  Kurbonazar wants to obtains a loan in the sum of 12,000 Somoni to purchase merchandise in order to expand his business.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise in order to expand his business

loans.name: Henry

texts.en:
Henry is 37 years old and married with four children. 

He runs a butcher shop to earn a living. He has been in the business for four years and has employed one person. Henry also earns extra income from his farming activities. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. 

Henry has applied for 40,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a bull for slaughter.

loans.use: To buy a bull for slaughter

loans.name: Ismonali

texts.ru: Исмонали женат и любящий отец двух дочерей. Он трудолюбивый и перспективный человек. Его жена занимается домохозяйством. Более одного года он занимается предоставлением услуг такси в своем городе. Из-за хорошего обслуживания  имеет постоянных клиентов. Исмонали хотел бы получить займ для покупки легкового автомобиля.
texts.en:
Ismonali is married and a loving father of two daughters. He is a hardworking and promising man. His wife is a housewife. 

For over a year Ismonali has been providing taxi services in his city. Because of his good service he has regular customers. Ismonali would like to receive a loan to purchase a car.

loans.use: to buy a car

loans.name: Shamsullo

texts.ru: Шамсулло женат и ответственный отец пятерых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и честный человек. Более 6 лет он занимается купле – продажей скота. Он покупает скот и откармливает их, а затем продает на рынке. В бизнесе помогают семья. Шамсулло хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью расширения бизнеса и увлечения поголовье скота.
texts.en: Shamsullo is married and a responsible father of five children. He is a very hardworking and honest man. For the last six years Shamsullo has been raising cattle for resale. He purchases young calves, raises and fattens them and sells for meat at the market. Shamsullo's entire family helps take care of the animals. He would like to take out a loan to purchase additional cattle for his herd in order to increase his profits.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Ravshanjon

texts.ru: Равшанджон умный и трудолюбивый человек. Он холост. Более одного года он занимается предоставлением компьютерных услуг, такие как компьютерные игры, интернет, набор и распечатка текстов, а также ксерокопию.  Равшанджон хочет расширить свой бизнес и с этой целью запрашивает займ для покупки 5 комплектов компьютеров, а также дополнительно клавиатуру и наушники для  других компьютеров. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Ravshanjon is a smart and hardworking man. He is single. For a year he has been running a computer center, where he offers various computer related services, such as a place to play computer games and browse the internet. He also offers typing, copy and printing services. Ravshanjon wants to expand the computer center and is taking out this loan to purchase 5 more computers, as well as extra keyboards and headphones for other computers. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to purchase of five sets of computer and accessories

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр женат и имеет двух несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. А он занимается выращиванием сльхозкультур. Более 5 лет он в этом бизнесе. Помогает сын и жена. В основном он сеет картошку и пшеницу. Кроме этого он занимается скотоводством. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. С прибылью он хочет проводит хатнатуйи своего сына. С этой целью он запрашивает займ для покупки семян картошки и скота.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor is married and has two young children. His wife is a home maker. Bakhtiyor supports the family by farming. He has been farming for more then five years and his wife and son help him as well. Bakhtiyor primarily grows potatoes and wheat, as well as raises cattle for resale. He wants to expand his farming and livestock business so that he can get more monthly profits. Bakhtiyor is planning to use the profits to celebrate the hatna-tuy (circumcision) of his son. Specifically, he is requesting the loan to buy seed potatoes for planting and additional cattle for his herd.

loans.use: to buy seed potatoes and cattle

loans.name: Abdulaziz

texts.ru: Абдулазиз трудолюбивый и добросовестный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Жена занимается домохозяйством и присматривает за ребенком. Более 4 лет он занимается купле- продажей запчастей велосипеда на рынке. Он сам занимается этим бизнесом ради содержания своей семьи в хороших условиях. Абдулазиз хотел бы получить займ для покупки запчастей велосипеда с целью  расширения  бизнеса.
texts.en: Abdulaziz is a hardworking and conscientious man. He is married and has one child. His wife is a home maker and takes care of their young child. For more then four years Abdulaziz has been dealing in bike spare parts on the market. He has opened his store make sure his family has a good life. Abdulaziz has taking out this loan to purchase a batch of bike spare parts so to expand his business.

loans.use: to buy bicycle spare parts

loans.name: Nurmahmad

texts.ru: Нурмахмад умный и добрый человек. Он женат и имеет 8 детей. Жена является швеей. Она шьет женские национальные платья. Более 5 лет Нурмахмад занимается купле- продажей скота. Один раз в неделю он ездит на рынок и продает скот, а затем покупает скот  дешевле. Нурмахмад хотел бы получить займ для покупки скота с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Nurmahmad is a smart and kind man. He is married and has eight children. His wife works as a seamstress - she makes traditional Tajik dresses for women. Nurmahmad raises cattle and has been successful with his business for more then five years. Once a week he drives to the market and sells his fattened cattle then uses the money to purchase cheap calves for fattening. Nurmahmad wants to take out this loan to buy more animals in order to have more cash on hand for future purchases. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Muhtaram

texts.ru: Мухтарам замужем и любящая мать одного ребенка. Она очень трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Более 3 -х лет она занимается купле- продажей детской одежды на рынке. Она приобретает товар два раза в неделю. Имеет постоянных клиентов, которым продает товар со скидкой. Она хотела бы получить займ для покупки нового ассортимента детской одежды с целью расширения бизнеса
texts.en: Muhtaram is married and a loving mother of one child. She is a very hard working and conscientious woman. For the last three years she has been selling children's clothes at the market. Muhtaram buys new inventory twice a week and has many regular clients who get good discounts. She wants to take out this loan to buy a new range of children's clothing in order to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase of a new range of children's clothing in order to expand business

loans.name: Gulchehra

texts.ru: Гулчехра разведенная женщина. Она очень трудолюбивая и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Она очень усердно работает, чтобы обеспечить своих детей, чтобы они не чувствовали отсутствия отца. Более 12 лет она занимается купле- продажей женской и детской одежды. Она является владельцем своего бизнеса и старается расширить его. Она хотела бы получить займ  для покупки женской верхней одежды и детской одежды. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Gulchehra is a divorced woman. She is very hard working and is raising two children. Gulchehra works diligently so that she can provide for her children and so that they would not miss the financial support a father can offer. For more then twelve years Gulchehra has been reselling women's and children's clothes at the market. She owns her business and wants to expand it. Currently she wants to take out this loan to purchase women's outerwear and children's clothes. Gulchehra hopes for your help and charity.

loans.use: to buy women's outerwear and children's clothes

loans.name: Fazilat

texts.ru: Фазилат умная и целеустремленная женщина. Муж работает в Российской Федерации . У них трое детей. Она очень трудолюбивая, более 19 лет занимается выпечкой и продажей лепёшек. Она торгует на рынке. Она начала свой бизнес с собственных средств и старалась его расширить. Фазилат хотела бы получить займ для покупки муки, соли и кунжута. Она надеется в вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Fazilat is a smart and goal oriented woman. Her husband works in Russia and the two have three children together. Fazilat is very hardworking and has been baking and selling Tajik flatbread at the market for more then 19 years. She has started her bakery using her own savings and has been expanding ever since. Fazilat wants to take out this loan to buy flour, salt and sesame wholesale for her bakery. She hopes for your help and support.

loans.use: to purchases of flour, salt and sesame

loans.name: Bashorat

texts.ru: Башорат замужем и любящая мать пятерых детей. Муж временно не работает. А она занимается выпечкой и продажей лепёшек. В бизнесе помогает родственник. Она начала свой бизнес в 1992 году с продажи лепёшек, а затем постепенно накопила денег и в 2005 году начала этот бизнес самостоятельно. Теперь она успешно продолжает этот бизнес и хотела бы получить займ для покупки муки. Она надеется за вашу доброту и великодушие.
texts.en: Bashorat is married and a loving mother of five children. Her husband is currently unemployed. Bashorat herself is supporting her family by baking and selling Tajik flatbread at the market. Her relatives help her with the bakery. Bashorat started her business in 1992 by simply re-selling flatbread at the market, but was able to save enough money to open her own independent bakery in 2005. Now she is very successful and would like to take out a loan to purchase a batch of flour. She hopes for your kindness and charity.

loans.use: to buy flour

loans.name: Malika

texts.ru: Малика трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Она разведенная женщина, на воспитании имеет двоих очаровательных детей. Более 10 лет она занимается выпечкой лепешек. Начала бизнес  собственными денежными средствами. Она очень старается расширить свой бизнес для того чтобы могла обеспечить своих детей. С этой целью Малика хотела бы получить займ для покупки муки, соли и кунжута. Она надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Malika is a hardworking and conscientious woman. She is divorced and is raising two wonderful children herself. For more then ten years Malika has been baking flatbread for sale, a business which she started using her own savings. Malika tries her best to make as much flatbread as she can so that she can assure her children are well taken care off. With this goal in mind Malika requests this loan to buy a large batch of flour salt and sesame seed for her bakery. She hopes for your help and charity.

loans.use: to buy flour, salt and sesame

loans.name: Nusratullo

texts.ru: Нусратулло женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Он очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный семьянин. Более двух лет он занимается купле- продажей сотовых трубок и их аксессуаров. В магазине также продает сим карты. В бизнесе помогает ему младший брат. Нусратулло хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000$ США, чтобы купить новые модели трубок. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Nusratullo is married and is raising one child.  He is a very hardworking and conscientious family man.  He has been involved in buying and selling mobile phones and accessories.  He also sells SIM cards at his store.  His younger brother helps him with this business.  Nusratullo wants to obtain a loan in the sum of $3000 to purchase new phone models.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy new phone models

loans.name: Kobuljon

texts.ru: Кабулжон женат и имеет одного ребенка. Жена учительница преподает в средней школе. Родители живут с ними. Более 7 лет Кабулжон занимается продажей бижутерии, сумок и разных видов заколок для волос. Кабулжон имеет много клиентов, так как его товар является ходовым товаром на рынке. Кабулжон хотел бы получить займ для покупки товаров с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Kobuljon is married and has one child.  His wife is a teacher at a secondary school.  His parents live with them.  Kobuljon has been involved in selling jewelry, purses and various types of hair pins for over seven years.  Kobuljon has many customers because his merchandise is highly demanded at the market.  He wants to obtain a loan to purchase new merchandise in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase new merchandise for sale

loans.name: Mahmud

texts.ru: Махмуд умный и добрый человек. Он очень трудолюбивый и целеустремленный человек. Последние 18 лет он занимается продажей канцтоваров на рынке. Два три раза в месяц приобретает товар на центральном рынке города. Кроме того он продает CD, DVD диски. В бизнесе помогают ему дочери. Махмуд хотел бы получить займ в размере 8000 Сомони для покупки аудио и видео дисков, а также канцтоваров с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Mahmud is an intelligent and kind man. He is a very hardworking, dedicated person. For the past 18 years, he has worked selling office supplies in the market. Two or three times a month gets his goods from the city's central market. In addition, he sells CDs and DVDs. His daughter helps him with his business. Mahmud would like to get a loan for 8,000 somoni to purchase CDs, DVDs, and office supplies in order to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase CDs, DVDs, and office supplies in order to expand his business.

loans.name: Hasan

texts.ru: Хасан женат и ответственный отец двоих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Более 31 лет он торгует на рынке. Он продает женскую и мужскую одежду, а также обувь. За эти многие годы он старался расширить бизнес, чтобы получить хорошую прибыль. Он имеет много клиентов и хорошую репутацию среди своих конкурентов. Хасан хотел бы получить займ в размере 6000 Сомони для покупки нового ассортимента одежды и обуви.
texts.en: Hasan is married and the responsible father of two children. He is a very hardworking and kind person. He has traded in the market for more than 31 years. He sells women's and men's clothing and shoes. During these years he has tried to expand the business and make a decent profit. He has a lot of customers and a good reputation among his competitors. Hasan would like to receive a loan of 6,000 somoni to purchase a new line of clothing and shoes.

loans.use: to buy new assortment of clothes and shoes

loans.name: Nuronshoh

texts.ru: Нуроншох очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он холост. Более 2 лет он занимается купле- продажей продуктов питания. Начал бизнес  собственными средствами и имеет магазин. Имеет постоянных клиентов, так как он привозит свежие продукты . В бизнесе помогает старший брат. Нуроншох запрашивает займ  для пополнения оборотного капитала, и создания дополнительных полок и стиляжьей для продуктов.
texts.en: Nuronshoh is a very hardworking and kind person.  He is single.  He has been involved in buying and selling food products for over two years.  Nuronshoh started his business with his own money and has a store.  He has regular customers because he brings in fresh products.  His oldest brother helps him with the business.  Nuronshoh is requesting this loan to refill his working capital and create additional shelves and displays for products.

loans.use: to refill his working capital and improve his business

loans.name: Sarvar

texts.ru: Сарвар умный, целеустремленный молодой мужчина, который работает таксистом и обеспечивает свою семью своим трудом. Его жена также помогает ему на содержании семьи. Она торгует на рынке. Сарвар любит свой бизнес и с удовольствием занимается этим.  Сарвар обращается к вам о финансовой помощи. Он хотел бы отремонтировать свой автомобиль. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Sarvar is a smart, goal-oriented young man, who works as a taxi driver and provides for his family with his work.  His wife also helps him with supporting the family.  She sells at a market.  Sarvar loves his business and runs it with satisfaction.  Sarvar comes to you for financial assistance.  He wants to repair his car.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to repair his car

loans.name: Odil

texts.ru: Одил трудолюбивый, заботливый семьянин. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Для создания жилищных условий и содержания семьи он работает на земельном участке. Он владелец 1,3 га собственного земельного участка. На своем земельном участке он выращивает лук, пшеницу и огурцы. Для подготовки земли к весеннему посеву ему нужны минеральные удобрения и ГСМ. Для этого он хочет получить займ в размере 3 000 сомони и подготовиться к посеву. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Odil is a hardworking and caring family man.  He is married and is raising three children.  In order to create good living conditions and support his family, he works on the land.  He owns 1.3 hectares of land.  Odil grows onions, wheat and cucumbers on his land.  He needs mineral fertilizers and fuel in order to prepare the ground for the spring sowing.  He wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 3,000 somoni for this purpose and get ready for the sowing.  Odil relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Abror

texts.ru: Аброр женат имеет на воспитании четверых детей. Семья большая. Жена домохозяйка. У него 3,90 га земли. На земельном участке он выращивает ячмень, лук, кукурузу, арбуз, огурцы. Для получения хорошей прибыли следует отлично поработать и подготовить землю к посеву. Для этого ему нужны средства для покупки ГСМ минеральных удобрений и семян. Он хочет получить займ  в размере 6000 сомони. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие.
texts.en: Abror is married and is raising four children.  His family is big.  His wife is a homemaker.  Abror has 3.90 hectares of land, where he grows barley, onions, corn, watermelons and cucumbers.  In order to make a good profit, he needs to work well and prepare the ground for the sowing.  He needs money to purchase fuel, mineral fertilizers and seeds for this purpose.  Abror wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 6000 somoni.  He relies on your support and mercy.

loans.use: to buy seeds, mineral fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Karim

texts.ru: Карим женат и имеет четверых детей. Жена домохозяйка. Семью содержит на полученные доходы от выращенной пшеницы, ячменя и огурцов. Работа на земле приносит хорошую прибыль. Он хочет подготовить землю к весеннему посеву и для этого ему надо приобрести ГСМ и семена для посева. Он хочет получить займ в размере 6000 сомони для приобретения ГСМ, минеральных удобрений и семян. Он надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие.
texts.en: Karim is married and has four children.  His wife is a homemaker.  He supports the family with the earnings from growing wheat, barley and cucumbers.  The work on the land yields a good profit.  Karim wants to prepare the ground for the spring sowing and needs to purchase fuel and seeds for sowing for this purpose.  He wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 6000 somoni to buy fuel, mineral fertilizers and seeds.  Karim relies on your support and mercy.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fuel

loans.name: Abduhoshim

texts.ru: Абдухошим более 10 лет занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он очень добросовестный семьянин и на воспитании имеет семерых детей.  Более 10 лет он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. В основном он выращивает пшеницы, ячмень, лук и помидора. Он имеет большую семью, и его семья помогают по бизнесу. Абдухошим хотел бы получить займ для покупки минеральных удобрений, семян и ГСМ. Он надеется на вашу помощь и понимание.
texts.en: Abduhoshim has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over ten years.  He is a very conscientious family man, who is raising seven children.  He primarily grows wheat, barley, onions and tomatoes.  Abduhoshim has a large family, who helps him with the business.  He wants to obtain this loan to purchase mineral fertilizers, seeds and fuel.  He relies on your help and understanding.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Shamsiddin

texts.ru: Шамсиддин женат имеет двоих сыновей. Женат.   Жена помогает по хозяйству. Шамсиддин занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и откормом скота. Отходы от выращенных культур идут на корм скота. В этом деле ему помогает отец. У него несколько голов мелкого рогатого скота. Он откармливает скот на протяжении 6 месяцев и затем продает на рынке по более высоким ценам. Он хочет получить займ в размере 5000 сомони для закупа скота, так как в настоящее время цены на рынке упали и он хочет увеличить поголовье скота и закупить 10 голов овцематок. Он надеется на вашу помощь и заранее благодарен вам.
texts.en: Shamsiddin is married and has two sons.  His wife helps out with the household.  Shamsiddin is involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up livestock.  The leftovers from grown crops go toward feeding the livestock.  His father helps him with this business.  Shamsiddin has several heads of small livestock.  He fattens up livestock for six months and then sells it at a market at higher prices.  He wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 5000 somoni to buy livestock because, at the present time, the prices at the market dropped, and he wants to increase livestock headcount by buying ten ewes.  Shamsiddin relies on your help and is grateful to you in advance.

loans.use: to buy ten heads of ewes

loans.name: Golib

texts.ru: Голиб женат, на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Жена домохозяйка, помогает мужу по хозяйству. Чтобы содержать семью он занимается откормом скота и выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 сомони для закупа крупного рогатого скота и семян ячменя для посева. Он надеется, что его поддержат и помогут  в подготовке к весеннему посеву и закупу трех голов крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Golib is married and is raising four children. His wife is a homemaker and helps her husband in the business. Golib fattens the cattle and cultivates crops to support his family. He wants to take out a loan in the amount of 5,000 somoni to buy large horned cattle and barley seeds for sowing. He hopes he will get the support and help to prepare for the spring sowing season and purchase of three heads of large horned cattle.

loans.use: to buy cattle and barley seeds for sowing.

loans.name: Mahmadrauf

texts.ru: Махмадрауф женат отец четверых прекрасных детей. Он трудолюбивый и хозяйственный мужчина. Более 18 лет занимается выращиванием картофеля и откормом скота. Он хочет благоустроить свой дом. Для этого его денежные средства недостаточны. Он хочет закупить несколько голов крупного рогатого скота для получения большего дохода. Он хотел бы получить займ в размере 5000 сомони и надеется на вашу помощь. Он благодарен тем кто поддержит его в данное время.
texts.en: Mahmadrauf is married and is a father of four wonderful children. He is hardworking and industrious man. He has been growing potatoes and fattening cattle for more than eighteen years. He wants to do landscaping for his home, but he does not have enough financial means for this. He wants to buy several heads of large horned cattle to receive a large profit. He wants to receive a loan in the amount 5,000 somoni and hopes for your help. He is thankful to all of you who will support him at this time.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Bobomurod

texts.ru: Бобомурод, любящий муж и заботливый отец троих детей. Он очень трудолюбивый человек и ничто никакие трудности не остановят его. Для того чтобы содержать свою семью он занимается на протяжении 12 лет выращиванием сельхозкультур и скотоводством. Отходы от выращенных культур идут на откорм скота. Он хочет получить займ в размере 10 000 сомони для обработки земли, покупки семян и в целом продолжения своего бизнеса. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Bobomurod is a loving husband and caring father of three children. He is a very hardworking man and no difficulties can stop him. He has been cultivating crops and doing animal husbandry for twelve years to support his family. The waste from crop cultivation are used to feed the cattle. Bobomurod wants to receive a loan in the amount of 10,000 somoni to cultivate the land, buy seeds and in whole to continue his business. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seeds.

loans.name: Faizimat

texts.ru: Файзимат трудолюбивый мужчина. Женат, на воспитании имеет троих детей Жена - лекарь. В бизнесе ему помогают члены его семьи. Он занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и откормом скота. В сельской местности это самое прибыльное и реальное дело. Он хотел бы получить займ в размере  2500 сомони для приобретения минеральных удобрений семян и оплаты за аренду трактора во время посева. Он уверен, что найдутся добрые люди и поддержат его в бизнесе.
texts.en: Faizimat is a hard-working man. He is married and is raising three children. His wife is a healer. The members of Faizimat's family help him in his business. He grows crops and fattens cattle. In rural areas this is the most profitable and accessible occupation. Faizimat would like to get a loan of 2500 somoni in order to purchase mineral fertilizer and seeds, and to rent a tractor during the sowing period. He is certain that there are kind people who will support him in his business.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer and seeds, and to rent a tractor

loans.name: Anor

texts.ru: Анор около десяти лет занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур и откормом скота. Он женат имеет четверых детей. Семья большая. Все доходы идут на содержание семьи и развитие бизнеса. Он выращивает пшеницу и ячмень. Имеет несколько голов крупного рогатого скота. Он хочет получить займ в размере 3500 сомони  и приобрести 200 кг семян пшеницы и ячменя и несколько голов крупного рогатого скота. Он надеется на ваше милосердие и доброту.
texts.en: Anor has been involved in growing agricultural crops and fattening up livestock for about ten years.  He is married and has four children.  His family is large.  All of his earnings go toward supporting the family and developing the business.  Anor grows wheat and barley.  He has several heads of cattle.  He wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 3500 somoni to purchase 200 kilograms of wheat and barley seeds, and several heads of cattle.  Anor relies on your mercy and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle and seeds

loans.name: Jamol

texts.ru: Джамол трудолюбивый семьянин. Он любит свою семью и своего ребенка. Он старается создать лучшие условия для своей семьи. Для этого надо много трудиться. Он трудиться на  участке земли, где выращивает ячмень. Отходы от выращенного ячменя идут на корм скота, который он откармливает дома. Он хочет получить займ в размере 3000 сомони для приобретения  трех голов крупного рогатого скота  и качественных семян для посева. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Jamol is a hardworking family man.  He loves his family and his child.  He tries to create the best conditions for his family and has to work hard to accomplish this.  Jamol works on the land, where he grows barley.  The leftovers from the grown barley go toward feeding livestock that he fattens up at home.  Jamol wants to obtain a loan in the sum of 3000 somoni to buy three heads of cattle and quality seeds for sowing.  He relies on your help and mercy.

loans.use: to buy seeds and cattle

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
La señora Victoria es una señora trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de antojitos mexicanos  como son : enchiladas , entomatadas ,tacos dorados y quesadillas.
También se dedica a la venta de  productos naturistas para la venta ella nos cuenta que vende sus productos de casa en casa en las comunidades vecinas.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Baltazar un señor trabajador que se dedica a la venta también a la venta de productos naturistas.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas productos naturistas para la venta.
texts.en:
Mrs. Victoria is a hardworking woman who sells some Mexican treats like enchiladas, entomatadas, tacos and quesadillas.

She also sells natural products and says that she sells those items door to door in neighboring communities.

Mrs. Victoria is happily married to Mr. Baltazar, a hardworking man who also sells natural products.

She needs the loan to buy more natural products/medicine to sell.

loans.use: buy natural products.

loans.name: Teodora Maria

texts.es:
La señora Teodora es una señora humilde  que se dedica a la venta de  perfumes y a la venta de trastes por mayoreo y menudeo.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor  Teodoro un señor muy amable quien también se dedica a la venta de plásticos.
Tiene la cantidad de  dos hijos a quienes quiere y desea ayudarlos para que tenga una mejor vida.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas  perfumes y plásticos para la venta ya que sus negocios le dejan buenas ganancias.
texts.en:
Mrs. Teodora is a humble woman who sells perfumes and dishes wholesale and retail.

She is happily married to Mr. Teodoro, a very kind man who is also a salesman, he sells plastic.

Mrs. Teodora has two children whom she loves very much and wants to help them have a better quality of life.

She needs the loan to buy more perfumes and plastics to sell since her businesses have very good profit margins.

loans.use: buy perfumes and plastic merchandize for the home.

loans.name: Leonardo  Javier

texts.es:
El señor Leonardo Javier    es un señor trabajador que se dedica a la siembra de frutas y verduras desdé hace siete años.
Don Leonardo Javier  nos cuenta  que sus frutas y verduras  las va a vender a los mercados de los pueblos vecinos.
Esta felizmente  casado con la señora  Antonia una señora trabajadora quien también se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras en su casa.
El pidió el préstamo para la compra de frutas y verduras para la venta .
texts.en:
Mr. Leonardo Javier is a hardworking man, for seven years he has grown fruits and vegetables.

Don Leonardo Javier says that his fruits and vegetables are sold in neighboring town markets.

He is happily married to Mrs. Antonia, a hardworking woman who also sells fruits and vegetables in their home.

Don Leonardo Javier needs the loan to buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.use: buy fruits and vegetables to sell.

loans.name: Luis Emilio

texts.es:
El señor  Luis Emilio es un señor trabajador que se dedica  a la soldadura de puertas y ventanas desde hace tres años.
Esta felizmente casado con la señora  María  Lisbeth una señora trabajadora quien lo quiero y lo apoya en su trabajo.
El pidió el préstamo para la compra de  material para soldaduras .
Le da las gracias a  fundación por apoyarlo.
texts.en:
Mr. Luis Emilio is a hardworking man who welds doors and windows; he has been in this field for about three years.

He is happily married to Mrs. María Lisbeth, a hardworking woman who loves and supports him in his work.

Mr. Luis Emilio needs the loan to buy welding materials.

He is grateful to the foundation for supporting his endeavors.

loans.use: buy material to weld windows and doors.

loans.name: Baltazar  Teodoro

texts.es:
El joven Baltazar Teodoro se dedica a la venta de ropa y decorados par fiestas  como son quince años y bodas .
El nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias y administra su tiempo y su dinero,
El pidió el préstamo para la compra de ropa y flores ,tela para decoraciones  para cualquier ocasión.
Le da las gracias a fundacion por su ayuda.
texts.en:
Young Baltazar Teodoro works selling clothing and party decorations for fifteen year old birthday parties and weddings.

He says that he enjoys his work very much because he gets good wages and gets to manage his time and money.

Baltazar Teodoro needs the loan to buy clothing, flowers and fabric for decorations needed for any occasion.

He is grateful to the foundation for all of their help.

loans.use: buy clothing, flowers and fabric for decorations.

loans.name: Jesus  Felipe

texts.es:
El Joven Jesús  Felipe  es  joven de veinte tres años es homosexual a el  nos cuenta que no le da pena que le viajan que homo sexual esta orgullosos de lo que es y como es ya que se considera una buena persona amigo de todos los que quieran.
Se dedica a la venta de  zapatos por mayoreo y menudeo  desde hace cuatro años.
El pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas calzado para la venta.
Le da las gracias fundación por el apoyo que le va a las personas  sin fijarse  en el sexo y como sean ya que todos merecen la oportunidad de triunfar con sus negocios.
texts.en:
Young Jesús Felipe is twenty-three years old, he is gay and says that he is not embarrassed of his sexual preference, he is proud of who he is since he considers himself to be a good person and friend to all who love him.

He has sold shoes wholesale and retail for about four years.

Jesús Felipe needs the loan to buy more shoes to sell.

He is grateful to the foundation for the support received through the organization that helps people without discriminating on peoples’ sexual preference and who they are since everyone deserves and opportunity to succeed in their respective businesses.

loans.use: buy shoes to sell.

loans.name: Yolanda Avilania

texts.es:
La señora Yolanda  se  dedica a la venta de calzado desde hace tres años ,ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias  y así  puede tener una mejor calidad de vida.
Esta felizmente casada con  el señor Gerardo un señor trabajador y humilde quien se dedica a las labores del campo.
Tambien se dedica a la venta de plantas y de madera.
Pidió el préstamo para la compra  de mas zapatos para la venta  por menudeo .
Le da las gracias a fundación por ayudarla  para que crezca  su negocio.
texts.en:
Mrs. Yolanda has worked selling shoes for some three years. She says that she enjoys her work very much since she gets a good income and is able to have a better quality of life.

She is happily married to Mr. Gerardo, a hardworking and humble man who is a farmer.

Mrs. Yolanda also sells plants and lumber.

She needs the loan to buy more shoes to sell retail.

Mrs. Yolanda is grateful to the foundation for helping her business grow.

loans.use: to buy more shoes to sell.

loans.name: Leticia

texts.es:
La señorita  Leticia  es una persona trabajadora que se dedica a la venta de  ropa típica desde hace tres años .
Ella nos cuenta que le gusta mucho su negocio por que le deja buenas ganancias  y las personas esta muy contentas por la ropa que vende ya que están ellas por manos mexicanas.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de mas ropa para la venta por mayoreo  y menudeo como los clientes deseen.
Le da las gracias a  fundación por el apoyo que le da  a los jóvenes.
texts.en:
Ms. Leticia is a hardworking person who sells typical clothing; she has done this for some three years.

She says that she enjoys her work very much since she gets a good income and her customers are very happy with the clothing that she sells since they are made by Mexican hands.

Ms. Leticia needs the loan to buy more clothing to sell wholesale and retail, depending on her customers’ needs.

She is grateful to the foundation for the support granted to young people.

loans.use: buy typical clothing to sell.

loans.name: Maria Elva

texts.es:
María, se dedica a la venta de tortillas, queso y crema, vive acompañada de su esposo y sus tres hijos, tiene cinco años de estar en el negocio, vende de manera ambulante, inicio con el negocio por ideas propias, hasta el momento le ha ayudado a mantenerse ocupada y generar ganancias para su familia.
Ella solicita un préstamo para invertirlo en maíz, leña, queso y crema, con esta inversión podrá tener la suficiente cantidad de productos para el negocio, así atender la demanda y mantener la preferencia de los clientes.
La aspiración de María es encontrar la alternativa de  crecer en el negocio, apoyada por su esposo y que sus hijos se vean beneficiados.
texts.en:
María sells tortillas, cheese and cream. She lives with her husband and three children. For five years she has worked selling lumber as a roving salesperson, she stared the business on her own and so far it has helped her keep busy and generate income to support her family.

María needs a loan to buy corn, firewood, cheese and cream, with this investment she will have enough materials for her business and meet her customers’ needs and preferences.

María’s dream is to find way to make her business grow with the support of her husband and that her children benefit from her hard work.

loans.use: buy corn, firewood, cheese and cream.

loans.name: Mildren Midey

texts.es:
Mildren, vive con su esposo, trabaja en la elaboración de ollas, sartenes, comales, de barro, este oficio lo aprendió desde pequeña, trabaja a tiempo completo todos los días, ya que de esta actividad logra generar los ingresos para el sustento familiar.
Ella solicita un préstamo para la compra de materiales como loza cruda, barro, nacazcol, con estos materiales ayudara a tener lo necesario para la elaboración de los productos, manteniendo lo necesario para continuar en el negocio.
El objetivo de Mildren es tener una buena inversión con el préstamo, que le ayude para realizar sus ventas y obtener dinero para aportar a su hogar.
texts.en:
Mildren lives with her husband. She makes earthenware pots, pans, and comales (a flat earthenware pan for cooking, like a griddle). Mildren learned her trade from a very young age; she works full time everyday since her work gives her the income necessary to support her family.

She needs a loan to buy materials like raw crockery, clay and nacazcol (a black dye) these materials will help her make her products, keeping what is necessary to keep her business going.

Mildren’s dream is to use her loan wisely and that it will help her sell her items and to have enough money from sales to support her home.

loans.use: buy materials like raw crockery, clay and nacazcol (a black dye).

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es:
La señora Paulina es una señora trabajadora de sesenta años de edad se dedica a la siembra de maíz desde hace cinco años.
Esta felizmente casada con el señor Sebastián con quien tiene  un hijo a quien desea darle un mejor futuro.
Ella pidió el préstamo para la compra de más maíz para la siembra ya que le deja buenas ganancias.
Le da las gracis afundacion por su apoyo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Paulina is a hardworking sixty year old woman who has worked growing corn for five years.

She is happily married to Mr. Sebastián with whom she has a child and wishes to give a better future.

Mrs. Paulina needs the loan to buy more corn to grow since she receives good income from its sales.

She is grateful to the foundation for its support.

loans.use: buy more corn to grow.

loans.name: Etienne

texts.en:
Etienne is 30 years old and is married with two children. 

He owns a bakery business, selling cakes, bread and so on. This is his tenth year in this business and he works from 7 am until 9 pm every day. Etienne currently employs ten people to help him.

Etienne has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to expand his bakery business by buying more cakes, bread, etc to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To expand his bakery business by buying more cakes, bread, etc to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy scrap metal for sale

loans.name: Jean Marie Vianney

texts.fr:
Jean Marie Vianney est né au Rwanda. Il a 36 ans et il est marié avec 6 enfants de 2 à 14 ans, dont 3 enfants sont scolarises. Son niveau d’éducation est de 3 ans de primaire.

Jean Marie Vianney est agriculteur. C’est son premier  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter du ciment, des tôles et payer la main d’œuvre pour la réhabilitation de sa maison.

Dans les prochaines années, Jean Marie Vianney voudrait  continuer ses études. Avec les profits, il prévoit  de scolariser ses enfants jusqu’au haute niveau et améliore le bien être de sa famille.
texts.en: Jean Marie Vianney was born in Rwanda. He is 36 years old, and married with 6 children ranging from 2 to 14 years old, 3 of whom are in school. He himself completed 3 years of primary education. Jean Marie Vianney is a farmer. This is his first loan request from ACB. He will use his loan to purchase cement and corrugated sheets, and to pay the labour to repair his home. In the coming years, Jean Marie Vianney would like to continue his education. With his profits, he intends to put his children through school up to high school level, and to improve his family's wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy cement and corrugated sheets, and to pay the labour to repair his home.

loans.name: Sughran's Group

texts.en:
Sughran is 41 years old, married and a mother of five children. 

She is a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. Due to her good customer relations and quality services, she receives regular orders every month.

Her husband sells dried fruit. His shop is in the market from where he operates his business. Sughran has given birth to five children. Her eldest son has a job while the others are getting their education.

She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s business. With the loan investment, he will buy dried fruit in larger quantities, which will allow him to make more profit by selling them.

The winter season is going on and the demand for dried fruit is high in the market. Sughran is confident that her husband will make a good profit from his business as a result of a loan.

loans.use: To buy dried fruits to sell

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy traditional clothing for resale.

loans.name: Sop Sokhna Faty Issa Group

texts.fr: Le groupe de solidarité Sop Sokhna Faty Issa a été crée le 21 septembre 2010 le jour de la première Assemblée Générale du Banc Villageois. Il est composé de 11 femmes issues de la même localité qui se sont unies par des liens d’amitié et de voisinage. Elles exercent la même activité le petit commerce. Momy habillée en boubou noir debout à droite sur la photo est responsable du groupe. Elle est âgée de 36 ans. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Elle fait le commerce de légumes au marché de Darou Mousty. Avec son prêt reçu, elle va augmenter son niveau d'approvisionnement acheter des légumes pour revendre au marché central de la ville. Ses bénéfices lui permettront de subvenir à ses besoins personnels, de renforcer son épargne dans le Banc Villageois et d'agrandir son activité.
texts.en: The community group Sop Sokhna Faty Issa was created on the 21st September 2010 - the day of the first General Assembly of the Banc Villageois. It is a group of 11 women coming from the same area, who are united by friendship and by being neighbours. They are all local traders. Momy, dressed in black traditional outfit and standing on the right in the photo, is the group leader. She is 36 years old. She is married and the mother of 3 children. She is a vegetable trader in the market at Darou Mousty. With her loan, she will increase her stock, buying vegetables in order to resell them in the town's central market. Her profits will allow her to cover her living expenses, to increase her savings with the Banc Villageois, and to grow her business.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables

loans.name: Duo Mujeres Con Talentos Group

texts.es: Duo Mujeres Con Talentos, Este Duo esta integrado por dos personas de las cuales esta doña Gloria Leticia,de 31 años de edad a lado de su esposo y con sus dos hijos se dedica a vender de forma ambulante,primero inicio son cosmeticos segun pedian los clientes,poco a poco incluyo a sus ventas ropa de tela para dama y niño,ahora incluyo la venta de blusas tipicas,en esta fecha ella siempre coloca su galeria en el parque del pueblo sus clientes le han pedido mas variedad de cosas pero ella no cuenta con el capital suficiente,el credito lo nececita para comprar ropa tipica,y surtur un poco mas su galeria, por su parte la señora ¿Deisy Leticia,tambien se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos en general de forma ambulante,espera que Fape y kiva le pueda ayudar dandoles el credito.
texts.en:
Duo Mujeres Con Talentos [Women With Talent Duo]:

This duo is formed of two women, one of whom is Gloris Leticia. She is 31 years old and lives with her husband and their two children. She makes a living as a street vendor. Initially she started selling cosmetics depending on her customers' orders. Then little by little she started including women's and children's clothing fabrics to her sales. Now she also sells traditional blouses. Around these dates she always sets up her stand in the village park. Her customers have ordered a variety of items from her but she does not have enough capital. She needs a loan to buy traditional clothing and to stock her stand. 

On the other hand, Deisy Leticia also makes a living selling cosmetics generally as a street vendor.

They hope that Fape and Kiva can help them by giving them a loan.

loans.use: to buy traditional clothing for resale.

loans.name: Chocruz 1 Group

texts.es:
La señora Marta es soltera, tiene 26 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, se dedica a la agropecuaria, a la crianza de gallinas ponedoras y a la crianza de ce4rdos, inició este negocio criando pollos de engorde, y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizara para la compra de cerdos, ya que quiere ampliar su granja de animales domésticos. Los demás integrantes del grupo se dedican al comercio y la producción agrícola.
texts.en:
Marta is single. She is 26 years old. She didn't have the chance to study and she makes a living in agriculture, raising laying hens and pigs. She started this business raising fattening chickens and has 6 years' experience to the day.

She is requesting a loan which she will use to buy pigs, as she wants to extend her domestic animal farm. The other members of the group make a living in agricultural production and trading.

loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Las "azucenas" Group

texts.es:
La señora Lucrecia es casada, tiene 28 años de edad, cursó los 6 años de educación primaria, tiene 2 hijos los cuales no estudian, se dedica a la atención a una tienda en general, inicio este negocio vendiendo golosinas y hasta el momento lleva 6 años de experiencia, cuenta con al apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica al mismo negocio.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de productos para la tienda: aguas gaseosa, jugos, golosinas, lácteos, cereales, embutidos y otros productos, con el fin de mejorar sus ventas y ganancias, espera en el futuro contar con una tienda grande que venda por mayor. Las demás integrantes de grupo se dedican al comercio, crianza de animales y a la crianza de animales.
texts.en:
Lucrecia is married and is 28 years old. She studied six years of primary education. She has two children who do not study. She makes a living running a general store. She started this business selling sweets and now has six years' experience. She relies on the support of her husband who also works in the same business.

She has organised a group to request a loan which she will use to buy products for her shop: soda water, juices, sweets, dairy products, cereals, cold meats and other products. She aims to improve her sales and earnings. She hopes to have a bigger store selling wholesale products in the future. The other members of the group make a living in trading and raising animals.

loans.use: to buy products for her shop: soda water, juices, sweets, dairy products, cereals, meats and other products.

loans.name: Duo Luz De La Esperanza Group

texts.es: Duo Luz de la Esperanza,Este Duo Esta Integrado por Dos personas Que dia a Dia Luchan por salir adelante,Tal Es El Caso de doña Fidelina,de 34 años de edad ella se dedica a la elavoracion de guipiles desde hace 5 años esta actividad ella nos cuenta que lo a realizado con mucho esmero ya que gracias a Dios poco a poco sus ventas han ido en aumento,el proposito de ayudar a su esposo y a sus hijos ya que el sueño de ella mas adelante es que sus hijos tengan mejores oportunidades,ella nos esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima para la elavoracion de guipiles.de igual forma doña Antonia esta solicitando este credito para la compra de materia prima ya que ella se dedica a la misma actividad que doña Fidelina.
texts.en:
Duo Luz de la Esperanza [Light of Hope Duo]

This duo is made up of two women who daily fight to get ahead. Such is the case that Fidelina, 34 years' old, makes a living making guipiles (traditional blouses), which she has done for the last five years. She tells us that she has carried out this work with dedication and thanks to God her sales have slowly increased. Her aim is to help her husband and their children. Her dream is that in the future her children can have better opportunities. She is requesting a loan to buy material to make guipilies. In the same way Antonia is requesting a loan to buy materials as she makes a living in the same activity as Fidelina.

loans.use: to buy materials to make guipiles (traditional blouses).

loans.name: Maria Irene

texts.es: Maria Irene,de 26 años de edad ella trabaja todos los dias en labado de ropa,tiene ya tiempo de dedicarse a esta actividad,tambien en sus ratos libres se dedica a cuidar sus animales en su casa,ella tiene un gran proposito para un futuro ya que esta solicitando este credito para la compra de animales para la crianza y luego cuando ya estan grandes venderlos a un mejor precio, y para la compra de alimentos para los mismos, ella nos cuenta que el mayor anhelo es tener un lugar mas grande para sus animales,y tener mayor capital para trabajar.
texts.en:
Maria Irene is 26 years old. She works every day washing clothes. She has made a living this way for some time. In her free time she looks after animals in her house. She has a great purpose for the future. 

She is requesting a loan to buy animals to raise and animal feed. Then when they are big she will sell them at a better price. She tells us that her biggest wish is to have a bigger place for her animals and to have more working capital.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise and to buy animal feed.

loans.name: Maria Juana

texts.es: Maria Juana,de 26 años de edad ella se dedica a la crianza de animales desde hace 5 años,y tambien se dedica a los bordados de manteles,ella nos cuenta que poco a poco a ido sobresaliendo en su negocito,ya que con el credito anterior pudo aumentar sus ventas un poco mas,y esta muy agradecida con la fundacion y Kiva por la ayuda brindada en el credito,de igual manera ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de mas animales y materia prima para la elavoracion de manteles.
texts.en:
Maria Juana is 26 years old and for the past five years she has made a living raising animals. She also embroiders tablecloths. She tells us that little by little she has excelled in her business. With a previous loan she was able to increase her sales a little more. 

She is very grateful to the MFI and Kiva for the help offered. In the same way she is now requesting a loan to buy more animals and material to make tablecloths.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise and to buy material to make tablecloths.

loans.name: Duo Tu En Mi Group

texts.es: Duo Tu en Mi.Silvia Susana de 19 años de edad. ella se dedica a la crianza y venta de pollos a parte de eso ella tambien se dedica al bordado de servietas,nos cuenta que ha luchado por salir adelante en su negocio y de la misma forma con su niño,ya que todavia nececita mucho cuidado,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de animales para la crianza,y compra de materia prima para la confeccion de tejidos,al igual que la señora natalia tambien se dedica a la misma actividad,y es por eso que esta solicitando este credito,ellas esperan que fape y kiva les puedan ayudar con el credito solicitando.
texts.en:
Duo Tu en Mi.

Silvia Susana is 19 years old. She makes a living raising and selling chickens. Apart from this she also embroiders serviettes. She tells us that she has struggled to get ahead in her business and with her son. As he still needs a lot of care, she is requesting a loan to buy animals to raise and to buy materials to make fabrics. 

Natalia also makes a living in the same activity and for this reason they are requesting a loan. They hope that Fape and Kiva can help them with the requested loan.

loans.use: to buy animals to raise and materials to make tablecloths.

loans.name: Diameguene Group

texts.fr: Le groupe de solidarité Diameguene a été créé le 10/12/2010.IL est composé de 14 femmes issus du même village. Le petit commerce est leur activité principale.Une parmi elles n'a pas bénéficié de prêt mais figure sur la photo. Elles ont pour responsable Nogaye âgée de 43 ans, elle est mariée et s'occupe de 07 enfants. Elle fait de la transformation d'huile d'arachide.Elle pratique cette activité depuis 10 ans et a une bonne expérience; elle est debout à droite sur la photo habillée en wax bleu et couverte d'un châle rouge.Son prêt va lui permettre d'acheter des arachides. Son objectif est de prendre en charge ses enfants.
texts.en: The Diameguene community group was created on the 10/12/2010. It is made up of 14 women from the same village. Their principal activity is local trade. One of them has not benefited from a loan but is in the photograph. Their leader is Nogaye who is 43 years old, married and she looks after 7 children. She is a producer of groundnut oil. She has been doing this for 10 years and has good experience; she is standing on the right of the photo dressed in a blue traditional dress and covered in a red shawl. Her loan will allow her to purchase groundnuts. Her objective is to take care of her children.

loans.use: to purchase groundnuts

loans.name: Solidario Palmeras Group

texts.es:
Solidario Palmeras: este Grupo esta integrado por 3 usuarias las cuales se dedican a distintos negocios.
Marlyn es unida tiene 32 años de edad tiene 4 hijos,ella inicio su negocio hace 2 años,vende chamarras y cubrecamas,inicio su negocio con la ayuda de una amiga quien le brindo ayuda tanto economicamente como moral mente,asi poco a poco fue poniendo su negocio,ahora ella esta solicitando este credito para la compra de cubrecamas,chamarras,ya que se ve en la nececidad de invertir mas para agrandar mas su negocio,agradese a Fape y kiva por la ayuda que les puedan brindar.
Al igual que la señora Norma elizabeth,se dedica a la venta de ropa para variada,como blusas camisas.vestidos etc.
Elsa se dedica a la venta de pan y cosmeticos,
texts.en:
Solidario Palmeras:

This group is made up of three members who make a living in different activities.

Marlyn is 32 years old and has four children. She started her business two years ago. She sells jackets and bed covers. She started her business with the help of a friend who helped her both economically and morally. So, little by little she set up her business. She is now requesting a loan to buy bed covers and jackets, as she sees that she needs to invest in order to extend her business. She appreciates the help offered by Fape and Kiva.

Norma Elizabeth also makes a living selling varied clothing such as blouses, shirts, dresses, etc.

Else makes a living selling bread and cosmetics.

loans.use: to buy jackets and bed covers for resale.

loans.name: Everianne

texts.en:
Everianne, 39, is married with four children aged between 6 and 17 years. Her business is well-organized. She sells clothes and works from 6am to 8pm every day. She has three years of experience in this business.

Everianne has requested a loan from Kiva partner Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more second hand clothes for sale. With any profit from the loan, Everianne will be able to build her own house and to save for her future.

loans.use: to purchase more second hand clothes for sale.

loans.name: Issabella

texts.en: Issabella, 43, is married with four children and engages in dairy farming to earn a living. She has been in this business for five years and employs one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Issabella has been able to save her income and she hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan Shillings to buy a dairy cow.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Prisallah

texts.en: Prisallah, 48, sells men's and women's suits to earn a living. She has been in this business for 12 years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Prisallah has been able to grow her business and she hopes to expand it further in the future. She has applied for a loan of 25,000 Kenyan Shillings to buy men's and women's suits for resale.

loans.use: to buy men's and women's suits for resale.

loans.name: Eyvaz

texts.en:
Eyvaz, 45, is single and lives in a small village. He is a cattle breeder and has more than 10 years of experience raising and selling cattle. During these years, Eyvaz has acquired the knowledge and skills required for the business.

Eyvaz usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them and sells the meat in the Agsu livestock bazaar. Looking after cattle is hard and requires spending a lot of time in the open air. The climate is very severe - very hot in summer and very cold in winter. However, Eyvaz is not alone in his business, as his father helps to pasture and feed the animals.

With a monthly profit is 300 Azerbaijani Manat (AZN), Eyvaz wishes to expand his business to improve the life of his family. For this purpose, he applied for a loan of 1800 AZN to purchase one milk cow, two cattle and fodder. This will be Eyvaz's fifth loan and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to buy one milk cow, two cattle and fodder.

loans.name: Mubariz

texts.en:
Mubariz is a 51-year-old man, married with four children. He is a market vendor who sells different kinds of goods such as shampoo, hair color, soap, some cosmetics, perfumes and home products. He has 11 years of experience and is considered to be an experienced and skilled person.

Mubariz usually buys his products from a wholesale market and then resells them for a profit in his own city. His wife helps him with selling goods.  His monthly profit from this business is 250 AZN. This is the only income in his family. 

Mubariz wishes to increase the number of products he carries and diversify what he sells to cover customers' demand. For this purpose, he has applied for 1000 AZN loan. He will use this loan to purchase more merchandise for his shop.

loans.use: to buy new products and diversify what he sells

loans.name: Bidkar Noel

texts.es: Bidkar Noel,de 24 años de edad el se dedica a la recompocicion de computadoras,compra y venta de las mismas desde hace 4 años, el nos cuenta que esta muy contento porque el lo ve como una forma y una oportunidad de salir adelante,esta solicitando este credito para la compra de computadoras,y repuestos ya que se ve en la nececidad de invertir mas,esta muy agradecido por la oportunidad que le puedan dar,ya que el dice que primero Dios con el credito piensa temer mejores ingresos y aumentar su capital.
texts.en: Bidkar Noel is 24 years old. He makes a living fixing computers. He has bought and sold computers for the last four years. He tells us that he is very happy because he sees a way and an opportunity to get ahead. He is requesting a loan to buy computers and spare parts, as he needs to invest more in his business. He is very grateful for the opportunity given to him, firstly by God. With this loan he hopes to have better income and increase his capital.

loans.use: to buy computers and spare parts for them.

loans.name: Ricardo Adan

texts.es:
El señor Ricardo Adan es soltero, tiene 35 años de edad, estudió para maestro, se dedica a la tejeduría, cortes típicos y servilletas, inició este negocio por iniciativa propia, y hasta el momento lleva 5 años de experiencia.

Solicita un préstamo que lo utilizará para la compra de hilos para tricotado y también hilo de alta seda y mish, espera en un futuro próximo tener  en negocio aun mas grande.
texts.en:
Ricardo Adan is single, 35 years old, studied to be a teacher and dedicates himself to weaving typical pieces and napkins.  He started this business under his own initiative and, until now, has 5 years of experience.

He requests a loan for the purchase of knitting yarn and silk threads.  In the future, he hopes to have a business that is even bigger.

loans.use: buy materials for knitting.

loans.name: Shakir

texts.en:
