As he is separated from their mother, he currently covers the costs of the household where he lives with the children all by himself. 

Joaquín wants his children to have a good standard of living and a stable financial future so they do not have to overcome as many hurdles as he has had to do. To earn his living Joaquín has sold wood for his whole life, and thanks to this work he brings in enough money to support his family. He buys tree lots, and by cutting down the trees, he obtains the wood to sell to his customers.

At the current time Joaquín has lots of orders so he has to buy more tree lots to satisfy his customers. However, he does not have sufficient money to buy any lots  so he is hoping to get a loan for this purpose and continue bringing in money to support his household.

Joaquín’s dream is to earn a great deal of money so that he can pay for his children to obtain a university education which would prepare them for well-paying jobs. He wants his children to do well financially so that they have a stable future, and for this reason he works very hard every day at his job.

loans.use: to buy tree lots so that he has wood to sell to his customers

loans.name: Raem

texts.en:
Raem is 51 years old.  She is married and resides with her husband and seven children in Takeo Province, Cambodia.  

She and her husband have been working in agriculture for over 20 years.  They have extensive experience and have been successful in their careers.  They are involved in growing rice and fattening animals.  Additionally, Raem’s husband is a construction foreman.  Finally, three of her children are employed at a garment factory. 

In order to improve the family economics, Raem is requesting a loan of $1,200 to purchase a trailer for her son to run a delivery service to generate more income for the family.  In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business, remodel her house and support her children while they study to earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a trailer for her son to run a delivery service.

loans.name: Juan Camilo

texts.es:
Juan Camilo es una persona que ha sufrido muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, siempre ha salido adelante con mucha dedicación a su trabajo y a su familia. 
Juan Camilo es un padre soltero que se encuentra a cargo de sus 3 hijos de 12, 13 y 15 años de edad. Para Juan Camilo ellos son la fuente de inspiración y de fuerzas para poder trabajar fuertemente todos los días.
Juan Camilo anteriormente trabajaba como obrero en diferentes construcciones, pero su trabajo era muy mal remunerado y los jefes que tenía lo maltrataban demasiado. Es por esto que Juan Camilo decidió independizarse, y desde hace aproximadamente 1 año y medio trabaja como oficial de construcción reparando daños y haciendo reformas en su región.
Juan Camilo trabaja solo, y sus servicios siempre han sido muy reconocidos por parte de sus clientes gracias a que son de muy buena calidad.
Juan Camilo quiere ofrecer un buen servicio a sus clientes, por lo que quiere comprar una máquina cortadora que le permita ofrecer el servicio completo en algunas reformas, sin embargo, actualmente no cuenta con el dinero suficiente para la compra de esta máquina. Es por esto que tiene la esperanza de que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de una máquina cortadora y poder así ofrecer sus servicios completos a sus clientes.
Juan Camilo sueña que con esta máquina podrá tener más contratos con más clientes, y así podrá aumentar sus ingresos para poder ofrecerles a sus 3 hijos una mejor calidad de vida y en un futuro un acceso a una educación universitaria que les permita conseguir un empleo con una buena remuneración.
texts.en:
Juan Camilo is a person who has gone through many adversities in his life.  However, he’s always gotten through them with much dedication to his work and his family.  Juan Camilo is a single father in charge of his three children who are 12, 13 and 15 years old.  For Juan Camilo, they are his source of inspiration and strength to work hard every day.

Juan Camilo used to work as a laborer on various construction jobs but his work was very poorly paid and bosses mistreated him very much.  Because of this, Juan Camilo decided to become independent and about a year and a half ago started to work as a construction official repairing damages and doing remodels in his region.  Juan Camilo works alone and his services have always been acknowledged by his customers because they are very high quality.

Juan Camilo wants to offer better service to his customers so wants to buy a cutting machine that will allow him to provide complete service in some of the remodels.  However, he currently lacks sufficient money to buy this machine and hopes that a loan will allow him to buy this cutting machine to provide full service to his customers.

Juan Camilo dreams that this machine will lead to more customer contracts so that his income will increase and he will be able to offer his three children a better quality of life and in future access to a university education that will allow them to get well-paid jobs.

loans.use: to buy an electric saw.

loans.name: Luz Omaira

texts.es:
Luz Omaira es una persona que se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a trabajar fuertemente y poder salir adelante con su familia.
Luz Omaira con 30 años de edad, se encuentra casada y es madre de 2 hijos de 10 años y 3 meses, por los cuales siempre trabaja con mucho esfuerzo con el ánimo de sacarlos adelante y poder brindarles todo lo que necesitan.
Luz Omaira actualmente trabaja en su propio negocio, el cual es una miscelánea en la que vende productos como ropa y papelería. 
Con el ánimo de aprovechar el inicio de la temporada escolar, Luz Omaira pretende comprar artículos de papelería, sin embargo, actualmente no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder acceder a estas compras, por lo que tiene la esperanza de que un crédito le permita comprar los artículos de papelería como lo son los cuadernos, cartulinas, lapiceros, borradores, entre otros, y poder así aprovechar la temporada escolar para aumentar sus ventas.
Luz Omaira tiene un gran sueño y es el de que sus 2 hijos puedan acceder a una buena educación, y en un futuro puedan cursar una carrera universitaria que les permita prepararse para un empleo que sea bien remunerado. 
Luz Omaira quiere que su esposo y sus 2 hijos tengan la mejor calidad de vida posible, y es por esto que siempre tiene en mente que sus ventas aumenten para poder generar mayores ingresos que le permitan cumplir este sueño.
texts.en:
Luz Omaira has dedicated a large part of her life to working hard so that her family can get ahead. She is 30 years old, married, and has two children, one aged 10 years and the other 3 months. It is for her children that she always puts in a great deal of effort so that she can provide them with all that they need.

Luz Omaira currently runs her own business selling a variety of items such as clothing and stationery. Because she wishes to take advantage of the approaching school year, she wants to buy school supplies but she doesn’t have enough money to make these purchases. A loan will allow her to buy note books, cardboard, pencils, erasers etc. so that she will increase her sales at this important time of year.

Her greatest hope is that her children can get a good education and eventually go to university so that they can get well-paying jobs. She wants her husband and two children to have the best standard of living possible, so always at the back of her mind is the hope that sales increase, income increases too, so that she can achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy school supplies ready for the beginning of the school year

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en:
Emmanuel is 39 years old.  He is married and has three children.  He owns a barber shop.  He has been in business for two years and he works from 7:00 AM until 8:00 PM every day except Saturday.  He currently employs three people to help him.

Emmanuel has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his barber shop business by buying new materials and chairs.  With any profit generated by the loan, he will be able to save for his future, to reinvest in his business and to pay school fees for his children.

loans.use: to expand his barber shop business by buying new materials and chairs.

loans.name: Jorge Humberto

texts.es:
Jorge se ha dedicado gran parte de su vida a la actividad el campo y la ganadería, y desde esta actividad genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su familia. 
Jorge con 29 años de edad, se encuentra casado y es padre de un niño de 5 años, y es por ellos por quienes siempre se esfuerza en su trabajo y a quienes siempre les quiere brindar lo mejor posible.
Jorge trabaja como mayordomo en una finca, y además de esto, ejerce la actividad de la venta de ganado, y de esta manera le ha podido brindar hasta el momento un acceso a la educación a su hijo, y una buena calidad de vida para el y su esposa.
Jorge actualmente tiene pedidos de varios clientes para la venta de ganado, por lo que requiere la compra de algunos ganados para criarlos y posteriormente venderlos a un buen precio, sin embargo, en la actualidad Jorge no cuenta con el capital suficiente para la compra de este ganado, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra del ganado y poder venderlo para seguir obteniendo ingresos suficientes con los que sostener los gastos de su hogar.
Jorge tiene un gran sueño y es de que algún día puedan tener su casa propia, donde su esposa, su hijo y el puedan vivir dignamente y en una vivienda privada, por esto Jorge siempre trabaja fuertemente para poder conseguir los ingresos necesarios para que este sueño se le cumpla.
texts.en:
Jorge has spent a large part of his life working in the field and with livestock, and from these activities, he has generated the necessary income to provide support for his family.  Jorge is 29 years old, married, and the father of a 5-year old son. For his family, he always strives to succeed in his job, and he always wants to provide them with the best that he can.  Jorge works as the person in charge of a farm, and he also sells cattle.  In this manner, he has been able to provide his son with access to education and a good quality of life for he and his wife.  

Jorge now has orders from various customers from the sale of cattle, for which he needs to buy some calves to raise them and later sell them at a good price.  However, in reality, Jorge currently does not have enough capital to purchase this livestock.  For this reason, he hopes that a loan will allow him to purchase the cattle and be able to sell them, so that he can continue earning enough income to support the expenses of his home.  

Jorge has a big dream, that one day, he might be able to have his own house, where he, his wife, and his son might live with dignity in a private dwelling.  For this dream, Jorge always works hard to earn the income necessary to achieve this dream.

loans.use: To buy cattle to raise, then later sell, them to his customers.

loans.name: Pedro Antonio

texts.es:
El señor Pedro, tiene 36 años de edad, es casado con dos hijos.

Él se ha dedicado a la agricultura, fue su tío quien le enseño. Hace 12 años que se desempeña como corralero en una ganadería que esta a un kilómetro de la ciudad.

Pedro solicita un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para cancelar una deuda que tiene con su jefe. Él desea quedar solvente y formar un record con la Fundación, construir una casa propia de bloque, sembrar maíz, para brindarle un mejor futuro a su familia brindándole todo lo necesario.
texts.en:
Pedro 36, is married and has two children.  He has worked as a farmer; his uncle taught him.  For 12 years he has worked as a ranch worker, in a cattle farm one kilometer from the city.  

Pedro is applying to Fundación Campo for a loan to pay off a debt he has with his boss. He wishes to become solvent, and establish a good record with Fundación. He wants to build his own cement block house and grow corn, in order to offer a better future to his family by providing them with the necessities.

loans.use: To pay off a debt that he has with his boss.

loans.name: Hoeurn

texts.en:
Hoeurn is 57 years old.  She is married and resides with her husband and five children in Takeo Province, Cambodia.   She and her husband have been involved in the business of agriculture for over 20 years.  They have extensive experience and are successful in their careers.  They are involved in growing rice.  

Three of Hoeurn’s children are employed at the garment factory.  Due to the difficulty in traveling to work, Hoeurn is requesting a loan in the amount of $1,000 in order to purchase a motorbike for her children to commute to work.  By doing so, her children would be able to save some money on their transportation expenses to better support the family. 

In the future, Hoeurn would like to expand her agricultural business and rebuild her present house to provide a comfortable living condition for the family.  Moreover, she hopes to support her children while they study to earn bachelors degrees.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her chidren to commute to work.

loans.name: Hasanjon

texts.ru: Хасанджон женат и имеет двух несовершеннолетних детей. Он занимается услугами микроавтобуса более 5 лет. Этим  бизнесом он занимается с удовольствием, ему очень приятно обслуживать клиентов. Старается, чтобы клиенты были довольными.У него свои постоянные клиенты. Хасанджон хотел бы получить займ для покупки запчастей для ремонта автомобиля.
texts.en: Hasanjon is married and has two young children. He has been offering a taxi service using a minivan for  more then five years. Hasanjon likes his work and enjoys taking care of his clients. He always makes sure his customers are satisfied and as a result has many regular clients. Hasanjon is needs this loan to purchase spare parts for his car.

loans.use: to buy spare parts

loans.name: Dilshoda

texts.ru: Дилшода замужем. Муж занимается предпринимательством. С 2008 года она занимается выращивание ячменя, лука и арбуза. Она имеет 2,9 гектара земли для посева. У неё семья очень дружная и всегда помогает ей по бизнесу. Дилшода хотела бы получить займ в размере 4000 Сомони для покупки семян, ГСМ и минеральных удобрений. Дилшода надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Dilshoda is married and her husband is a businessman. Since 2008 Dilshoda has been growing oats, onions and watermelons on 7 acres/2.9 hectares of land. Her family is tight-knit and they all help with the farm. Dilshoda wants to take out a loan of 4000 somoni to purchase seeds, fuel and fertilizer. She hopes for your help and support.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Davlyat

texts.ru: Давлят проживает в районе Джиликул. Ему 67 лет. Он занимается садоводством. В этой области он 5 лет. Кроме того Давлят сеет пшеницу. Кредит берет для закупа минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Davlyat lives in Jilikul region. He is 67 years old. Davlyat has been growing fruits in an orchard for the last five years. He also grows wheat and is taking out this loan to purchase fertilizer.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer

loans.name: Kholmurat

texts.ru: Холмурат проживает в районе Чиликул. Ему 49 лет. Он женат. У него двое детей. Его сын студент. Сам он занимается выращиванием овощей и посевом пшеницы. Этим видом деятельности занимается более тридцати лет. Кредит берет для закупа семян картошки.
texts.en: Kholmurat lives in the Jilikul district.  He is 49 years old, married and has two children.  His son is a student.  Kholmurat is involved in growing vegetables and sowing wheat.  He has been in this business for over thirty years.  He is requesting this loan to buy potato seeds.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds

loans.name: Maria Yolima

texts.es:
Maria Yolima es una persona muy trabajadora y dedicada a su familia. Con 29 años de edad, se encuentra casada y es madre de 2 hijos de 10 y 5 años de edad. 
Maria Yolima quiere que sus hijos puedan acceder a una buena educación y quiere que su esposo y ella puedan mejorar la condición de vida actual, y es por esto que se esfuerza en su trabajo todos los días para aportar a los gastos del hogar y poder así mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
Maria Yolima se dedica a la venta de mercancía de uso personal por catálogo, y gracias a esto genera ingresos extras para su hogar.
Actualmente Maria Yolima tiene muy buenos pedidos por parte de sus clientes, por lo que debe comprar mercancía para atender estos pedidos, sin embargo, Maria Yolima no cuenta con el capital suficiente para la compra de estos productos, por lo que tiene la esperanza de que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de la mercancía de uso personal como son desodorantes, lociones, cosméticos, entre otros productos para poder así atender los pedidos de sus clientes y seguir aumentando su nivel de ventas.
Maria Yolima sueña con que su negocio le genere grandes ingresos y de esta manera pueda cumplir su anhelo de montar su propio almacén en el cual venda mucha mercancía y tenga muchos clientes, y tener grandes ingresos que le permita brindarles a sus 2 hijos en un futuro el acceso a una educación universitaria de calidad.
texts.en:
Maria Yolima is a very hard-working person who is very dedicated to her family.  She is 29 years old, married and the mother of 2 children ages 10 and 5.  Maria Yolima wants her children to have access to a good education and that she and her husband can improve their current living conditions.   For this reason she works hard every day to contribute to the household expenses and improve her family's quality of life.  Maria Yolima sells personal use products through catalogs and she is thankful that it generates extra income for her household.  Currently, Maria Yolima has very good orders from her customers and she needs to buy the merchandise to fill those orders.  However, she doesn't have enough capital to buy the products and she is hoping that a loan will make this possible.  She will buy personal use items such as deodorants, lotions, cosmetics, and other products to be able to fill her customer's orders and continue growing her sales.  

Maria Yolima dreams that her business will generate a large income and she will be able to fulfill her desire to open her own store from which to sell her merchandise and have many customers.  She would also like to have a large income that would allow her to give her 2 children access to a quality university education in the future.

loans.use: purchase personal use items such as deodorants, lotions, cosmetics, and other products.

loans.name: Bahodur

texts.ru: Баходур женат и ответственный отец четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Более 12 лет он занимается купле- продажей одежды. Он начал свой бизнес с небольшой суммы и постепенно расширил свой бизнес и увеличил товарооборот. Имеет много постоянных клиентов. Торгует на рынке. Баходур хотел бы получить займ в размере 3000$ США для покупки нового ассортимента одежды с целью расширения бизнеса и увлечения товарооборота.
texts.en: Bahodur is married and a responsible father of four children. He is very hard working and a kind man. For more then twelve years Bahodur has been selling clothes. He started his business with a small amount of money and has expanded slowly to have a diverse inventory. He has many regular clients at the market stall where he works. Bahodur wants to take out a loan of 3000 US dollars to purchase new batch of clothing in order to further expand his business and increase goods turn over.

loans.use: To buy new clothing to sell

loans.name: Shuhrat

texts.ru: Шухрат проживает в районе Дангара. Ему 28 лет. Он холост. Уже несколько лет он занимается торговлей яблок на рынке. Он привозит фрукты на своей грузовой машине. Кредит берет для покупки бананов и мандаринов.
texts.en: Shuhrat lives in the Dangara region. He is 28 years old and single. For many years he has been selling apples at the local market. He brings the fruit to the market using his own truck. Shuhrat wants to take out this loan to also purchase bananas and tangerines for sale at the market.

loans.use: to purchase bananas and tangerines

loans.name: Achildi

texts.ru: Ачилди добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и ответственный отец четверых детей, один из них несовершеннолетний. Жена работает в хозяйстве. Ачилди более 11 лет занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур. Он выращивает лук и арбузы. Также он занимается откормом крупного рогатого скота. Ачилди имеет свое дехканское хозяйство «Мухаммадрахим»- это 15,82 гектар земли. Ачилди запрашивает займ в размере 3000$ США для вспашки земли, покупки минеральных удобрений, семян и оплаты зарплаты рабочим. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Achildi is a kind and hardworking person.  He is married and is a responsible father of four children, one of whom is an adolescent.  His wife works in the household.  Achildi has been involved in growing agricultural crops for over 11 years.  He grows onions and watermelons.  He is also involved in fattening up cattle.  Achildi owns his dekhan farm of 15.82 hectares, called "Muhammadrahim."  Achildi is requesting a loan in the sum of $3000 to plow land, purchase mineral fertilizers, seeds and pay his workers' salaries.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizers and seeds

loans.name: Nada

texts.en:
Due to cultural issues, Nada rejected having her picture uploaded on the internet, so the man in the photo is Nada's husband. Nada is a 28-year-old married woman from Bani Kenanah, Irbid; Jordan and a mother of two children.

Nada is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase home furniture with an aspiration of improving her family living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase home furniture

loans.name: Abdusalom

texts.ru: Абдусалом женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Более 5 лет он занимается купле- продажей одежды и обуви. Начал свой бизнес с продажи носков и детских вещей, постепенно расширил бизнес и увеличил товарооборот. Торгует на местном рынке. Абдусалом запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для увлечения и пополнения оборотных средств.
texts.en: Abdusalom is married and has two children. For the last five years he has been selling shoes and clothes at the market. He started his business by selling socks and children clothes but has since expanded and switched the focus of his enterprise. Abdusalom sells from a stall at the local market. He is requesting a loan of 5000 somoni to have more cash on hand for wholesale purchases.

loans.use: to refill his working capital

loans.name: Komilchon

texts.ru: Комилдчон женат и ответственный отец двух несовершеннолетних детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 12 лет он занимается выращиванием картошки и пшеницы. Также он занимается откормом скота. Он также имеет  дополнительный доход от услуг по строительству. Он мастер-строитель.  Комилчон хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян картошки, а на остальную сумму хочет купить скот. Он надеется на вашу помощь и милосердие.
texts.en: Komilchon is married and a responsible father of two young children. His wife is a home maker. Komilchon has been growing wheat and potatoes for more then twelve years. He also raises cattle. Aside from farming Komilchon sometimes works as a construction worker and has a master builder certificate. Currently Komilchon wants to take out a loan to buy seed potatoes for planting and use the rest of the money to purchase more cattle. He hopes for your help and charity.

loans.use: To buy seeds and cattle

loans.name: Obloberdi

texts.ru: Облоберди с 2001 года занимается выращиванием ячменя, пшеницы и лука. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей. Он имеет 5 гектаров земли для посева сельхозкультур.  Облоберди имеет дружную семью и хочет содержать их в хороших условиях. Он запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки ГСМ, семян и минеральных удобрений. Он надеется на вашу помощь и поддержку.
texts.en: Obloberdi has been growing oats, wheat and onions since 2001. He is married and is raising three children. Obloberdi has 12 acres/5 hectares of farm land. His family is loving and tight-knit and as a father he wants to make sure they have a good life. Obloberdi is taking out a loan of 5000 somoni to purchase fuel, seeds and fertilizer. He hopes for your help and support.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizer and fuel

loans.name: Na'amah

texts.en:
Due to cultural issues, the Na'amah rejected having her photo uploaded on the internet, so the woman in the photo is her mother. Na'amah is an 18-year-old single lady from Marka, Amman, Jordan,.

Na'amah has a home-based project in which she sells cosmetic products and perfumes.

Na'amah is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase cosmetics and perfumes for trading purposes and she is looking to improve her family's living income.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and perfumes to sell

loans.name: Haleema

texts.en:
Haleema is a 24-year-old married woman from Irbid, Jordan and a mother of three children.

Haleema is making pickles in her home and selling them to neighbors and friends. Now, Haleema is requesting a loan of 400 JD to purchase materials needed in making pickles.

Haleema is looking to expand her business and rent a near shop for her project.

loans.use: to purchase materials needed to make pickles

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en:
Mahmoud is a 24-year-old man from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan.

Mahmoud is about to get married and he is requesting a loan of 1,500 JD to finance part of his wedding expenses.

loans.use: to finance part of his wedding expenses

loans.name: Farah

texts.en:
Farah is a conservative person who prefers not to have her photo published online, so her brother Mohammad appears in her Kiva profile photos. Farah is a 19-year-old single lady from Marka, Amman, Jordan.

Farah started her business selling small quantities of her products to neighbors and friends. Now Farah is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase cosmetics products and accessories for trading purposes. 

Farah is looking to open her own shop since she is working from home in addition to helping her family improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics and accessories to sell

loans.name: Shuhratjon

texts.ru: Шухратджон женат и ответственный отец пятерых детей. Жена занимается домохозяйством. С 2001 года Шухратджон занимается выращиванием пшеницы, лука, арбуза и огурцов. Он имеет 5,4 гектара посевной земли. Он получает хороший урожай, а также хорошую прибыль. Шухратджон хотел бы получить займ для покупки семян, ГСМ и минеральных удобрений.
texts.en: Shuhratjon is married and a responsible father of five children. His wife is a home maker. Since 2001 Shuhratjon has been growing wheat, onions, watermelons and cucumbers. He has 13 acres/5.4 hectares of farm land which yields a good harvest and a good profit from produce sales. Shuhratjon want to take out a loan to buy seeds, fuel and fertilizer.

loans.use: To buy seeds, fertilizers and fuel

loans.name: Fakhridin

texts.ru: Фахридин проживает в районе Шахритус. Ему 33 года. Он женат. У него трое детей. Фахридин занимается животноводством. Он откармливает и продает скот. Этим видом деятельности занимается 15 лет. Кредит берет для закупа бычков и корма.
texts.en: Fakhridin lives in Shahrituz region. He is 33 years old, married and has three children. Fakhridin raises cattle for meat sales at the market. This has been his occupation for more then fifteen years. Fakhridin is taking out this loan to buy calves and fodder for them.

loans.use: to purchase calves and fodder

loans.name: Nonvignon Group

texts.fr: Le groupe NONVIGNON est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la troisième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de leur activité. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Fifonsi Hortense est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Fifonsi Hortense est âgée de 34 ans et est mariée à un coiffeur. Fifonsi Hortense vit ensemble avec son mari et ses enfants. Le couple a deux enfants tous scolarisés et à leur charge. Les diverses charges de la maison sont assurées par le couple. Pour y parvenir, Fifonsi Hortense mène comme activité depuis huit ans environs la vente des sacs de charbons de bois dans un marché du Bénin. Parallèlement, Fifonsi Hortense vend des bidons d’huile végétale. Cette activité lui permet de contribuer sans grande difficulté aux besoins de la maison. Fifonsi Hortense s’approvisionne dans son quartier. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaire et son revenu, Fifonsi Hortense sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe NONVIGNON, un troisième crédit. Les deux premiers prêts ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The Nonvignon group is made up of three people who live in the same neighbourhood. This is the third time the group has requested financial assistance from Alidé in order to improve their businesses. 

The group's representative is Fifonsi Hortense, who has her hand raised in the photo. She is 34 years old and lives with her husband, who is a hairdresser, and children. The couple have two children to support, who are both in school, and are able to meet household expenses. 

For around eight years, Fifonsi Hortense has been selling sacks of charcoal and cans of vegetable oil at a Benin market in order to meet these expenses. This means she can contribute to her family's needs without difficulty. She buys her supplies in the neighbourhood. In order to satisfy her customers and increase her revenue and income, Fifonsi Hortense is requesting this third loan along with the others in her group. The first two loans have been repaid.

loans.use: to buy bags of charcoal and cans of vegetable oil

loans.name: Jesuwame Group

texts.fr: Le groupe JESUWAME est composé de quatre personnes qui résident dans le même quartier. C'est la cinquième fois que ce groupe sollicite l'aide financier de ALIDé, afin d'élever le niveau de son activité. Le représentant du groupe, du nom de Honoré est celui qui a la main levée sur la photo. Honoré est âgé de 47 ans et vit au Bénin. Honoré n’a pas fréquenté l’école. Honoré est marié à un  certain Elisabeth. Le couple a cinq  enfants tous scolarisés, dont trois à leur charge. Honoré vit ensemble avec sa femme et ses enfants. Afin d‘assurer les diverses charges de la famille, Honoré exerce depuis quinze ans environs comme activité, la pêche. Dans le but d’acquérir des matériels nécessaires au bon fonctionnement de son activité et lui permettant de pêcher plus de poissons, Honoré  sollicite, ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe  JESUWAME, un cinquième crédit auprès de ALIDé. Ce crédit lui permettra certainement d’accroître son chiffre d’affaire et par ricochet son revenu. Les crédits obtenus précédemment ont été bien remboursés.
texts.en:
The group Jesuwame is made up of four people who live in the same neighbourhood. This is the fifth time they have requested financial assistance from Alidé to increase their business activity. The group's leader is Honoré, who is shown with his hand up in the photo.

Honoré is 47 years old and lives in Benin. He didn't go to school. Honoré is married to Elisabeth, and the couple have five children, all of whom attended school. They still have three of the children in their care. 

For 15 years, Honoré has been working as a fisherman to provide for the family. Along with the other members of his group, he is seeking a fifth loan from Alidé in order to buy the equipment he needs to work and catch more fish. This loan will allow him to increase his revenue and thereby his income. The previous loans have been successfully repaid.

loans.use: to buy nets and fishing baskets.

loans.name: Grace De Dieu Group

texts.fr: Le groupe GRACE DE DIEU est composé de trois personnes qui résident dans la même zone géographique. La représentante du groupe, du nom de Belasire Sètondji est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Belasire Sètondji est âgée de 35 ans et vit au Bénin. Belasire Sètondji a arrêté l'école au cours secondaire. Belasire Sètondji  est mariée à un couturier nommé Arsène et est mère de deux enfants, tous scolarisés. Le couple subvient ensemble aux divers besoins du ménage. Pour faire face à ses diverses charges, Belasire Sètondji vend depuis une dizaine d'année, des produits de mercerie et des boissons de façon secondaire. Belasire Sètondji s'approvisionne dans une ville du Bénin et vend ses produits dans sa région. Dans la quête de la satisfaction de sa clientèle et pour accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu, Belasire Sètondji sollicite ensemble avec les autres membres du groupe GRACE DE DIEU, un crédit auprès de ALIDé.
texts.en:
The group Grace de Dieu has three members who all live in the same area. 

Belasire Sètondji, who has her hand raised in the photo, is the group's representative. She is 35 years old and lives in Bénin. She stopped school when she reached secondary level. Belasire Sètondji is married to a tailor called Arsène and has two children, who both attend school. The couple provide jointly for the needs of the household. 

Belasire Sètondji has been selling dressmaking supplies for around ten years, along with drinks as a secondary business. She buys supplies in a town in Benin and sells her products locally. In order to satisfy her customers and increase her revenue, Belasire Sètondji is requesting this loan from Alidé along with the other members of the group.

loans.use: to buy dressmaking supplies and drinks.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is 27 years old. He sells potatoes to earn a living. He has been in the business for four years and has employed two people. He describes his business environment as competitive because many people do the same business. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, James has been able to save his income and hopes to grow his business in the future. He has applied for 20,000 Kenya Shillings to buy more potatoes to sell.

loans.use: To buy more potatoes to sell.

loans.name: Yorn

texts.en:
Yorn, 53, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in the agricultural business for over twenty years, have an extensive experience, and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing rice. All of Yorn's children are employed at a garment factory. 

In order to improve her family livelihood, Yorn is requesting a loan of USD 1000 to purchase a piece of farmland for growing more rice in order to get high yield in the harvest season. By doing so, she would be able to generate more income for the family. In the future, she would like to purchase still more farmland for growing rice, renovate her house, and support her children to study until they get a Bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to purchase a piece of farmland for growing more rice.

loans.name: Nhol

texts.en:
Nhol, 37, is married and resides with her husband and two children in Takeo Province, Cambodia. She has been selling grilled beef for over ten years, earning approximately USD 5 per day. Her husband has been working as a butcher for over ten years as well and earning approximately USD 6 per day. 

In order to improve her business, Nhol is requesting for a loan of USD 1000 to grow the working capital in her business in order to purchase more beef to grill and sell. By doing so, she would generate more income to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her business and rebuild her house so it is much stronger, and to provide comfortable living conditions for the family. In addition, she hopes to support her children to study until they get a Bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to purchase more beef to grill and sell.

loans.name: Vey

texts.en:
Vey, 39, is married and resides with her husband and three children in Kampot Province, Cambodia. She and her husband have been involved in agricultural business for over twenty years, have an extensive experience and are successful in their career. They are involved in growing rice. Additionally, her husband is a security guard. One of her children (a son) is employed at a garment factory. 

Due to his difficulty in traveling to work, Vey is requesting a loan of USD 1200 to purchase a motorbike for her son to commute to work. By doing so, her son would be able to get to work on time and save some money on his transportation expenses to support the family. In the future, she would like to expand her agricultural business and rebuild her house to provide comfortable living conditions for the family, and support her children to study until they finish their Bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her son to use to commute to work.

loans.name: Tith Savoeurn

texts.en:
Tith Savoeurn, 26, is married and resides with his wife and two children in Kampot Province, Cambodia. He has been an automobile mechanic for over six years, earning approximately USD 7 per day. His wife is a hairdresser and earns approximately USD 5 per day. In order to improve his family economy, Tith Savoeurn is requesting a loan of USD 700 to purchase a machine to squeeze sugarcane to get juice to sell. By doing so, he would get extra income to support the family. 

In the future, he would like to purchase a truck to use to deliver goods to sell. In addition, he hopes to rebuild his present house to provide a better living condition for his family and support his children to study until they get a Bachelor's degree.

loans.use: to purchase a machine to squeeze sugarcane to get juice to sell.

loans.name: Jacqueline

texts.en:
Jacqueline is 30 years old and is married with two children, 3 and 5 years old. Her business is well-organized. She sells bread and works from 6am until 8pm every day. She has one year of experience in this business. 

Jacqueline has requested a loan from Kiva partner via Vision Finance Company in order to expand her bakery business by making more bread to sell. With any profit from the loan, she will be able to pay school fees for her children and to save for her future.

loans.use: To expand her bakery business by making more bread to sell.

loans.name: Musee

texts.en: Musee is 25 years old. He runs a motorcycle transport business to earn a living. He has been in the business for two years and describes his business environment as good because he has regular customers. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to improve his living standards and he hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 25,000 Kenya Shillings to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: To buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Wenvoo

texts.en:
Wenvoo is a 37-year-old married woman. She has five children with ages ranging from 5 months to 15 years. She describes herself as a patient and persistent woman. She operates a retail business where she sells brooms. She has been involved in this business for one year. Her business is located in a viable area and her primary customers are women.  In addition, she runs a  grocery store business to increase her income. 

Wenvoo describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of raw material (reeds) used. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase more brooms and reeds for making more brooms. Wenvoo's  business goal is to run a greengrocery store, fully stocked with all types of vegetables within five years.

loans.use: to purchase more brooms and reeds for making more brooms.

loans.name: Gayane

texts.en: Gayane runs a grocery shop. She has applied for this loan to purchase food for her shop. Gayane has already applied to SEF for a loan, which helped her to purchase goods for the shop and increase the sales. Gayane's previous loan was also posted on the KIVA website. Gayane has successfully paid off the previous loan and now needs to take out a new one. The main income Gayane gets currently helps her to cover the family's costs, but it doesn't let her to make savings and invest in the business. This made Gayane to apply for a loan again. This loan will help Gayane to develop her business further.

loans.use: to pay for food.

loans.name: John

texts.en: John is a 34-year-old married man. He has a son who is five months old. He describes himself as honest and energetic. He operates a retail store where he sells household necessities such as sugar, cooking oil, flour, bread, tea leaves etc. He has been involved in this business for five years. His business is located in a viable area and his primary customers are local residents and schools. He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high cost of products sold. He will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more products to sell. John's  business goal is to be a wholesaler within five years.

loans.use: to buy more household necessities to sell.

loans.name: Shakir

texts.ru: Shakir pereyexal i seychas jivet v Absheron regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. On jenat i imeyet 2 detey. Shakir 51 let. On smenil i svoy bizness v svazi so smenoy mesta jitelstva. Seychas on prodayet frukti i ovoshi. Shakir  Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов). Seychas on nujdayetsya v 800 AZN chtobi kupit frukti i ovoshi dlya uludsheniya svoyego biznessa. Eto uje vtoraya ssuda on ochen otvetstvenniy kliyent kotoriy oplachival vo vremya vsu ssudu.
texts.en:
Shakir and his family moved and now live in the Absheron region. Shakir is 51 years old, married and has 2 children. He had to start another business in a new area. Shakir now sells fruits and vegetables. 
Shakir is an Internally Displaced Person (IDP), that is a person who was forced to flee from his/her home because of the armed conflict, violence, human rights violation, natural disasters and other catastrophes; however, as compared to a refugee, IDP remains within his/her country's borders (source: the UN's Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs). 
Shakir now needs AZN 800 to purchase fruits and vegetables to improve his business. This is his second loan. Shakir is a responsible client who has always repaid the loans on time.

loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables

loans.name: Olga Cecilia

texts.es:
Olga es una persona que ha sufrido muchas adversidades en su vida, sin embargo, ha tenido la pujanza y el carisma para poder salir adelante y luchar por un mejor futuro.
Olga con 43 años de edad, se encuentra casada y es madre de 2 hijos, a los que les quiere brindar siempre lo mejor. El esposo de Olga trabaja, pero sus ingresos son muy bajos y no le alcanza para cubrir todos los gastos de su hogar, es por esto que Olga decidió ayudarle con los gastos del hogar y poder así mejorar las condiciones en las que viven actualmente. 
Olga se ha dedicado a la venta de helados y frutas con helado, un negocio que montó desde su casa, y poco a poco ha ido aumentando la cantidad de productos que vende en su negocio.
Olga actualmente quiere comprar productos de papelería para afrontar el inicio de la temporada escolar, y así generar mayores ingresos para el sustento de su familia, sin embargo, Olga no tiene el capital suficiente para poder comprar esta mercancía, por lo que aspira a que un crédito le permita acceder a la compra de los productos de papelería como son cuadernos, cartulina, borradores, entre otros y de esta manera aprovechar el inicio de la temporada escolar y generar más ingresos para su hogar.
Olga quiere que su negocio le brinde mejores ingresos y poder así mejorarles la calidad de vida a su esposo y a sus 2 hijos.
Además, Olga tiene el gran sueño de que sus 2 hijos puedan acceder a una buena educación y en un futuro acceder a una educación universitaria que les permita obtener un empleo bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Olga is a person who has suffered much adversity in her life, but despite this, she’s had the strength and charisma to get ahead and fight for a better future. Olga is a married, 43-year-old mother who wants the best for her 2 children. Olga’s husband works, but his pay is too little to cover their household expenses. That’s why she decided to help him with the household expenses to improve the conditions in which they currently live. 
Olga sells ice cream and fruit with ice cream, a business she started from her home. Little by little, her ice cream sales have grown. Now, she’d like to increase her income to help out her family, by adding paper products to her business in time for the beginning of the new school year. Unfortunately, she doesn’t have enough capital to buy merchandise. That’s why she is hoping a loan will permit her to buy paper products, such as notebooks, poster board and erasers, among other things, and that way she can take advantage of the new school year and generate more income for her household.  
Olga wants her business to bring in more income so she can offer her husband and children a better quality of life. 
Also, Olga has a dream that her 2 children will be able to access a good education and in the future, a university education that will allow them to obtain well-paying jobs.

loans.use: Buy paper products like notebooks, poster board, erasers and pencils, among other things, to be ready for the the beginning of the new school year.

loans.name: Bilquees' Group

texts.en:
Bilquees has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her husband’s animal-selling business. With the loan investment, he will buy goats and sheep to sell to butchers for a profit. He will also buy animal feed in larger quantity to give better quality food to his animals.

Bilquees is a seamstress and sews clothes for her neighboring clients. She has given birth to six children. Her eldest son works while three of her remaining children are studying.

Bilquees has a lot of confidence in her husband that he will make good use of the loan money and expand his business.

Note:In the photo, the lady holding a book (called Asasah Passbook) is Bilquees.

loans.use: To buy goats and sheep for animal-selling business.

loans.name: Fidel

texts.en:
Fidel is 29 years old and is married with two children, 2 months and 3 years old. He owns a carpentry business and sells wooden doors. This is his eighth year in this business and he works from 9 am until 6 pm every day.

Fidel has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company in order to expand his carpentry business by making more wooden doors to sell. With any profits, he will be able to save for his future and to reinvest in his business.

loans.use: To expand his carpentry business by making more wooden doors to sell.

loans.name: Esther

texts.en: Esther is a 30-year-old married woman.  She has no children yet. She describes herself as an honest and loving woman. She operates a beauty salon where she provides services such as plaiting, blow-drying, etc. She has been involved in this business for one year. Her business is located in a viable area and her customers are frequently new ones. She describes her biggest business challenge to be the high cost of beauty products. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more beauty products. Esther's  business goal is to run a bigger salon  within five years.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products.

loans.name: Janeffer

texts.en: Janeffer, 48 years old, is married and has 5 children. She has operated a green grocery store for 10 years. Janeffer describes her business environment as favorable because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Janeffer has been able to improve her living standards. She hopes to expand her business in the future. Janeffer has applied for a loan of 20,000 Kenya Shillings (KES) to buy a sack of potatoes, bananas and tomatoes.

loans.use: To buy potatoes, bananas and tomatoes

loans.name: Farzana's Group

texts.en:
Farzana, 31 years old, was married at a young age and has 6 children. Her 2 elder children are getting their education while the others are not yet of school-going age. Since it is difficult to manage the household expenses from her husband's earnings, Farzana also works by sewing clothes for her neighboring clients. The income she earns helps to pay her children's school fees.

Farzana's husband is a scrap dealer who sells scrap to different factories and to other scrap dealers in the city. Farzana has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the further improvement of her husband’s business. He will use the loan investment to buy scrap in bulk quantities that will allow him to fulfill his clients' orders on time and to increase his profits.

loans.use: To buy scrap

loans.name: Winfred

texts.en: Winfred is 25 years old and the mother of one child. She has operated a beauty salon for 4 years and employs one person. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, Winfred has been able to save her income. She hopes to expand her business in the future. Winfred has applied for a loan of 20,000 Kenya Shillings (KES) to buy a blow dryer machine.

loans.use: To buy a blow dryer machine

loans.name: Kalbubu

texts.ru:
Калбубу 56 лет, вдова, воспитала троих детей.  Основным источником дохода для семьи Калбубу  является животноводство и полеводство, начатое еще в 1996 году. Стартовав с начальной суммы в 9,000 сом (KGS), Калбубу смогла развить свое хозяйство, приносящее около 10,000 сом (KGS) в месяц от продажи молока и молочных продуктов. На сегодняшний день в хозяйстве Калбубу имеется пять дойных коров, две кобылы, одна рабочая лошадь. Также Калбубу возделывает 2,96 га земли, где выращивает картофель, зерновые культуры и эспарцет.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Калбубу обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на покупку дополнительных голов скота. Доходы Калбубу планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение поголовья скота.
texts.en: Kalbubu is 56 years old, a widow and raised three children.  Her family's primary source of income is animal husbandry and farming, started in 1996.  Having started with an initial sum of 9,000 som (KGS), Kalbubu was able to develop her business to currently yield about 10,000 som (KGS) per month from sales of milk and dairy products.  Today, her business contains five dairy cows, two mares and one work horse.  Kalbubu also works on 2.96 hectares of land, where she grows potatoes, cereal crops and sainfoin.  In order to further grow her business, she requested a loan in the sum of 100,000 som (KGS) from the "Bai-Tushum and Partners" company to purchase additional livestock.  Kalbubu plans to invest the profits into increasing livestock headcount further.

loans.use: to purchase livestock

loans.name: Ruby Susana

texts.es:
Ruby ha sido una persona que ha sufrido muchas adversidades en su vida. El padre de sus hijos la abandonó, y ella quedó como una madre soltera cabeza de familia de 3 hijos, los cuales son el motor para esforzarse todos los días.
Ruby ha sido muy trabajadora durante toda su vida, y esto le ha permitido afrontar las necesidades que ha tenido; desde hace un tiempo tiene su propio negocio que es una tienda general, donde vende toda clase de productos de la canasta familia, abarrotes, entre otros.
Ruby actualmente cuenta con muy buenos clientes y quiere que sus ventas aumenten, por lo que quiere comprar artículos de papelería para afrontar la temporada escolar. Sin embargo, Ruby no cuenta en el momento con el capital suficiente para poder lograr comprar estos productos, por lo que aspira a que un préstamo le permita acceder a la compra de productos de papelería como son cuadernos, cartulinas, borradores, entre otros, y poder así aumentar sus ventas y poder generar mayores ingresos para su familia.
Ruby sueña con que sus 3 hijos puedan acceder a una buena educación, que les permita prepararse bien para que en un futuro puedan ingresar a un empleo bien remunerado. Además sueña con tener su propia casa, tener su propio local y poder tener una estabilidad económica que le permita tener una mejor calidad de vida tanto a ella como as sus 3 hijos.
texts.en:
Ruby has suffered much adversity in her life. The father of her children abandoned her, leaving her as the head of the family with 3 children who are the impetus for her efforts every day.
Ruby has worked very hard all her life, and this has helped her face the hardships she’s had. For a long while now, she has her own business, a general store, where she sells all kinds of retail products for the family and groceries, among other things.
Ruby has very good clients and wants her income to increase, so she’d like to buy paper products to take advantage of the school year. Despite this, Ruby doesn’t have enough capital to buy these products. She is hoping to get a loan to be able to buy paper products, such as notebooks, poster board and erasers, among other things, to increase her sales and generate more income for her family.  
Ruby dreams that her 3 children access a good education that prepares them well so that in the future they can obtain well-paying jobs. As well, she dreams of having her own home, her own place and economic stability that will allow a better quality of life for herself and her 3 children.

loans.use: buy paper products, such as notebooks, poster board, erasers and pencils, among other things.

loans.name: Saima's Group

texts.en:
Saima has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for her beauty parlor. She started her beautician business a few years ago in order to financially support her husband whose income was not enough to fulfill the family's basic needs. Saima will use this loan investment to buy shampoos, creams and other beauty related products to offer better quality beauty services to her clients and to increase her income.

Saima's husband is a salesman who supplies toffees, candies, etc. to different general stores in the city. Saima has a daughter who is 7 years old and studying in the 2nd grade. Saima is a very good embroidery expert as well and operates an embroidery business on a part-time basis. She is very confident that she will be able to successfully improve her business with this loan.

loans.use: To buy shampoos and creams

loans.name: Jean Claude

texts.en:
Jean Claude, 33 years old, is married and has four children aged between 2 and 6 years old. He owns a boutique where he sells various goods such as cosmetics, clothes, soap, etc. This is his tenth year in this business. 

Jean Claude has requested a Kiva loan via Vision Finance Company to purchase various goods such as cosmetics, clothes, soap, etc. to sell. He will use any profits generated from this loan to save for his future, to reinvest in his business and to build his own house.

loans.use: To purchase various goods such as cosmetics, clothes, soap, etc. to sell.

loans.name: Ramzana's Group

texts.en:
Ramzana is divorced and lives with her parents. Since she didn’t want to become a burden to them, she started an animal sales business a few years ago. Ramzana buys young goats and sheep, raises them and sells them to butchers once they become healthy. She has applied for a loan from KIVA partner Asasah for the further growth of her business. Ramzana will use the loan to buy young goats and sheep to sell to butchers later on. She is very confident about her business success as a result of this loan investment.

Note: In the photo, Ramzana is holding a book (the Asasah Passbook).

loans.use: To buy goats and sheep

loans.name: Sembradoras De Pacabrican Group

texts.es:
La señora Catarina es casada, tiene 40 años de edad, no tuvo la oportunidad de estudiar, tiene 8 hijos 2 de ellos estudian, se dedica a la crianza de animales, inició este negocio con un pequeño capital y hasta el momento lleva 8 años de experiencia, espera en el futuro su negocio sea grande y con mejores ingresos, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien se dedica a la agricultura.

Organiza un grupo para solicitar un préstamo que le servirá para la compra de ganado y cerdos, ya que quiere ampliar su granja y mejorar sus ganancias. Las demás integrantes del grupo se dedica a la agricultura, a la crianza de animales y a la artesanía.
texts.en:
Ms. Catarina is married, 40 years old and never had the chance to study. She has 8 children, 2 of whom are in school. She works raising animals. She started this business with a little bit of capital eight years ago. She hopes that in the future her business will grow and produce even more income. She has the support of her husband, who also works in agriculture.

She organized a group to ask for a loan that would help her to buy cows and pigs, since she wants to help her farm grow and increase her income. The other members of the group work in agriculture, raising livestock and making artisan crafts.

loans.use: to buy cattle and pigs.

loans.name: Jonathan Yancarlo

texts.es:
Jonathan , de 26 años de edad, casado , se dedica a la venta de accesorios y reparación de teléfonos en la ciudad de Granada. Antes se dedicaba a trabajar como obrero en una fabrica textil pero el salario era muy bajo el quería crecer y tener mejores ingresos su tío tenia un negocio de venta de celulares y vio que los ingresos eran mucho mejores así que tomo la decisión de poner su propio negocio con la liquidación que le dieron en su anterior trabajo cuando renuncio. Hoy en día lleva dos años con su negocio ganando mas clientes y mejorando la variedad y estilo de celulares que hoy en día mas que un lujo es una necesidad de comunicación. 
El realizo el crédito para compra de celulares. Pues necesita tener surtido su inventario de celulares en especial aquellos de precios accesibles para la población pues en donde vende es una zona muy turística y el comercio es bueno. El esta ahorrando para comprar su propio local y surtirlo de mas productos y vender recargas de minutos a celulares.
texts.en:
Jonathan, twenty-six years old and married, repairs phones and sells accessories in the city of Granada. He used to work as a laborer in a textile plant but the wages were too low. He wanted to grow and to have a better income. His uncle had a small business selling cell phones and Jonathan saw that the returns were much better, so he decided to start his own business with the payment he got when he quit his job.  He has been working at this for two years now, getting more clients and improving the quality and variety of the cell phones he sells, which more than a luxury item have become a communication necessity. 
He got the loan to buy cell phones. He needs to have a good selection of them, especially those with affordable prices for the public. He works in a tourist area where sales are good. He is saving to buy his own shop and supply it with more products. He also wants to sell minute refills for cell phones.

loans.use: to buy cell phones

loans.name: Mafili

texts.fr:
Née vers1965 à NIENA, MAFILI est mariée et mère de 5 enfants vivant avec son  époux à Niena ville (troisième région administrative de la république du Mali).
Elle mène cette activité de commerciale de pagnes, de vêtements, de bazins, depuis plus de 9 ans. Son expérience dans ce domaine, lui a valu une bonne réputation et reçoit des commandes de divers marchandises, tels les tissus, bazins, chemises, parfums et des parures. Ainsi pour avoir les ressources nécessaires afin de satisfaire ses clients, elle  décida de collaborer avec l’Institution de microfinance Soro Yiriwaso, il y'a 8 ans maintenant,  tous les prêts antérieurs ont été correctement remboursés.  
Ce  nouveau prêt lui permettra d’acheter, 15 pièces de bazin moyen riche, 50 paires de boucles d’oreille et une quinzaine de glacières.
Elle s’approvisionne dans les marchés de Bamako. Les ventes sont généralement faites sur commande à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes sur place. 
Avec ce prêt, elle envisage réaliser un bénéfice mensuel moyen de 95 000 FCFA par mois. Ce bénéfice lui permettra de payer les intérêts de son prêt et investir le reste dans son activité.
texts.en: Born around 1965 in Niena, Ms. MAFILI is a married mother of five children who is living with her husband in Niena City (3rd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). For nine years, she has been running a business selling pagnes (colorful West African cloth), clothing, and damask. Her experience in this domain has earned her a good reputation. She receives orders for various goods, such as cloth, damask, shirts, perfumes, and fashion accessories. Thus, to have the necessary resources to satisfy her customers, she decided to collaborate with the micro-finance institution Soro Yiriwaso eight years ago. The previous loans were all correctly repaid. This new loan will enable her to buy: 15 lengths of moyen riche damask, 50 pairs of earrings, and about 15 insulated containers (coolers). The supplies come from the markets of Bamako. Sales are generally made by special order to a customer base composed of local women and men. With this loan, Ms. MAFILI envisions making an average monthly profit of 95,000 francs CFA per month. This profit will enable her to cover the loan interest and to invest the rest in her business.

loans.use: to buy various goods

loans.name: Lina Cristina

texts.es:
Lina es una persona muy luchadora y trabajadora en su vida, que ha tenido que ver como su sueño de estudiar una carrera universitaria se aplace debido a la falta de recursos económicos para continuar con sus estudios.
Lina estaba estudiando psicología en una universidad de la ciudad, sin embargo, tuvo que abandonar sus estudios y aplazarlos debido a la falta de dinero para pagar sus matrículas y demás gastos en los que incurría.
Es por esto que desde hace 7 años Lina trabaja como independiente ya que montó su propio almacén donde vende prendas de vestir para dama y caballero, como los son camisas, zapatos, jeans, entre otros.
Lina tiene una muy buena clientela, quien siempre es fiel a sus productos debido a que los vende a muy buen precio y son de muy buena calidad, además de que lo combina con una muy buena atención a sus clientes.
Lina actualmente tiene buenos pedidos de sus clientes de zapatos escolares y camisetas deportivas, debido a que próximamente inicia la temporada escolar.
Es por esto que Lina requiere de la compra de esta mercancía, pero no cuenta con el capital suficiente para hacerlo, es por esto que Lina tiene la esperanza de que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de zapatos escolares y camisetas deportivas que le permitan afrontar con una buena cantidad de mercancía la temporada escolar.
Lina aspira a que su negocio aumente sus ventas considerablemente en esta temporada, y por esto trabaja fuertemente. Además aspira que con los ingresos extras que entrarán por las buenas ventas, pueda culminar sus estudios de psicología en la universidad y desempeñar esta carrera que tanto le ha gustado.
texts.en:
Lina is a very feisty and hardworking person.  She has had to see her dream of studying for a university degree deferred due to a lack of financial resources to continue her studies.

Lina was studying psychology at a university in the city, but had to abandon her studies and defer due to lack of money to pay her tuition and other expenses she incurred.  This is why for 7 years Lina has been working independently and established her own store where she sells clothing for men and women, such as shirts, shoes, jeans, etc.

Lina has a very good customer base, who is always faithful to her products because they are sold at a good price and are of good quality. Additionally, Lina provides very good service to her customers. Lina now has a good number of customer orders for school shoes and sport shirts, because the school season starts soon.  This is why Lina needs to purchase these products, but does not have enough capital to do so.  Lina is hopeful that a loan will give her the ability to purchase a good quantity of school shoes and sport shirts for the school season.

Lina wants her business to increase in sales significantly this season, so she is working hard. She also hopes that with the extra income that will come from good sales, she can complete her studies in psychology at the university and fulfill the career that she liked so much.

loans.use: to buy school shoes and sports shirts to prepare for the school season.

loans.name: Chumageldi

texts.ru: Чумагелди очень трудолюбивый и добросовестный семьянин. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Более 15 лет он занимается выращиванием картофеля и гранат. Сельхозкультуры выращивает на приусадебном участке и на президентских землях. В бизнесе помогают дети. Чумагелди запрашивает займ в размере 2000 Сомони для покупки семян картошки и минеральных удобрений. Чумагелди надеется на вашу поддержку и милосердие.
texts.en: Chumageldi is a very hard working and conscientious family man. His wife is a home maker. Chumageldi is a farmer and has been growing potatoes and pomegranates for more then 15 years. He grows the crops on the house plot and on presidential lands. Chumageldi's children also assist their father with the farm. He is requesting a loan of 2000 somoni to purchase seed potatoes and fertilizer. Chumageldi is hoping for your support and charity.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Umruzak

texts.ru: Умрузак более 9 лет занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Он женат и на воспитании имеет пятерых детей. Супруга занимается домохозяйством. В основном Умрузак выращивать пшеницы и арбузы. Также он занимается откормом скота. Он выращивает сельхозпродукты на землях, выделенных президентом. В бизнесе помогают сыновья. Умрузак запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и корма для крупного рогатого скота.
texts.en: Umruzak has been farming for nine years. He is married and has raised five children. His wife takes care of the house and the kids. Umruzak primarily grows wheat and watermelons and also raises cattle for beef. He uses providentially allocated lands for his crops and his sons help him with the farm. Umruzak is requesting a loan to purchase fertilizer and fodder for his cattle.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizers and feeds for cattle

loans.name: Khudoidod

texts.ru: Худойдод трудолюбивый и честный человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет троих детей, двое из них несовершеннолетние.  Последние 8 лет он занимается ремонтом автомашин и сварочными работами. Мастерская находится у него во дворе. За запчастями сам ездит. Запрашивает займ для покупки красок и запчастей для автомашин. Заранее благодарен  КИВА и ИМОН Интернешнл.
texts.en: Khudoidod is a hardworking and honest man. He is married and has three children, two of which are underage. For the last eight years he has been repairing cars and welding for a living. His shop is located in his backyard and he himself drives to get all the necessary spare parts for repair. Khudoidod is requesting a loan to buy auto paint and spare parts for cars. He is in advance grateful to Kiva and Imon International.

loans.use: To purchase paint and spare parts

loans.name: Kiplagat

texts.en:
Kiplagat is a gentleman who is 38 years old and married to Gladys. They have four children. Kiplagat is in the livestock trading business. He buys sheep and goats, which he later resells at a profit. He has been in this business for the last three years and gets a profit of about 5,000 Kenya shillings per month. His wife is also working and contributes to the family’s total monthly income.

Kiplagat is a new client of KADET LTD and he has requested his first loan with us. He will use this loan to pay for some solar light bulbs, which will help his family be able to operate with some light in the house. The solar kit can also be used to charge phones, which will also be an income project for the family. The lighting will make it easy for his children to do their homework and he will be able to listen to his favorite radio station as the kit also has a radio system in it. He hopes to use the profits to add more livestock and thus expand his stock.

In the future, he hopes to be a very famous livestock trader and be able to invest in better innovations that make life bearable for his family.

loans.use: To buy solar kits

loans.name: Maria Edilma

texts.es:
Maria Edilma es una persona que se ha caracterizado por ser muy trabajadora y estar siempre dedicada al bienestar de su familia.
Maria Edilma se encuentra casada y es madre de 3 hijos, a los cuales siempre les brinda lo necesario.
Maria Edilma actualmente se dedica a la elaboración de traperas, escobas, cepillos entre otros artículos para el aseo, actividad que aprendió de su esposo. Gracias a esta actividad Maria Edilma genera los ingresos necesarios para sostener los gastos de su hogar, además de poder brindarle a su esposo y sus 3 hijos las necesidades básicas.
Algunos hijos de Maria Edilma le ayudan a menudo en su trabajo, ofreciendo sus productos a clientes nuevos y tomando nuevos pedidos para poder crecer las ventas.
Actualmente, Maria Edilma trabaja en su taller sola y quiere realizarle algunas adecuaciones locativas, sin embargo, no cuenta con el capital suficiente para poder llevar esto a cabo, por lo que tiene la esperanza de que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la remodelación de su área de trabajo, de modo que con las mejoras locativas que le realice, le quede mucho más cómodo trabajar y hacer así que su trabajo sea más productivo.
Maria Edilma tiene el sueño de que sus ventas se incrementen luego de que estas mejoras sean realizadas, pues sus trabajos saldrán con una mayor calidad y podrá también producir más en las horas que trabaja.
Maria Edilma espera que con este incremento en las ventas pueda mejorarles la condición en la que viven su esposo, ella y sus 3 hijos, y poder así mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria Edilma is a very hard-working person who is always devoted to her family’s well-being.  Maria Edilma is married and has three children to whom she always provides the necessities.

Maria Edilma currently devotes herself to making mops, brooms, and brushes, among other cleaning items.  She learned this business activity from her husband.  Thanks to this business Maria Edilma generates the income needed to support the household expenses.  She is also able to give her husband and their three children the basic necessities.

Some of Maria Edilma’s children help her often with her work.  They offer her products to new customers and take new orders in order to be able to increase sales.

Maria Edilma currently works in her shop alone, and she wants to make some adjustments to her locale.  However, she does not have enough capital to be able to do so.  She therefore has the hope that a loan will give her the possibility of remodeling her work area.  With the improvements, her shop will be a lot more comfortable to work in, and it will make her work more productive.

Maria Edilma has the dream that her sales will increase after these improvements are made.  Her work will turn out to be of better quality, and she will also be able to produce more in the hours that she works.

Maria Edilma hopes that with this increase in sales she will be able to improve the living conditions for her husband, her three children, and for herself.  She hopes to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to make some adjustments to her work locale in order to be able to work more comfortably and to be more productive.

loans.name: Mushkiniso

texts.ru: Мушкинисо разведенная женщина и имеет единственную дочь. Она более двух лет занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. В основном он выращивает арбузы, кукурузу и гранаты. Кроме того она является главным бухгалтером дехканского хозяйства «Кишвар», а также является членом этого хозяйства. В бизнесе помогают братья. Она является владельцем одного гектара посевной земли. Займ запрашивает для закупки семян арбуза и минеральных удобрений. Она заранее благодарна вам за вашу доброту и помощь.
texts.en: Mushkiniso is divorced and has one daughter. She has been farming for two years and primarily grows watermelon, corn and pomegranates. Additionally, Mushkiniso works as the chief accountant for a farming cooperative "Kishvar" and is one of its members. Her brothers helps with the farm and she owns 1 hectare/2.5 acres of farm land. Mushkiniso is requesting a loan to purchase watermelon seeds and fertilizer. She thanks everyone in advance for help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy seeds and mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Fikret

texts.ru: Fikret 34 qoda. On ne jenat i ne imeyet detey. Fikrat seychas nujdayetsya v 1600 AZN chtobi sdelat remont svoyego doma , on iz bednoy semyi i u nego net vozmojnosti zdelat remont. On xochet obustroit dom a potom v budushem postroit svoyu semyu. Fikret trudolubiviy userdno rabotayushiy chelovek. On gotov rabotat na luboy rabote i v luboye vremya sutok glavnoye obespechit svoyu semyu. Fikret sam rabotayet v pekarne gde izgotavlivayut xleb. Fikret jivet na okrayennoy posolke Baku regiona vmeste so svoimi roditelyami, no posle otremontirovaniya svoyego doma on planiruyet pereyexat tuda.
texts.en: Fikret is 34 years old. He is single and has no children. Fikret needs a loan of 1600 AZN to be able to perform repairs to his house. He comes from a poor family and has no other means to finance the repairs. Fikret wants to improve his house so that he will be able to have a family in the future. He is a hard working and diligent man, who is willing to perform any job and work at odd hours so that he is able to provide for his family. Fikret works in a bakery where he makes bread. He lives at the edge of a village in the Baku region together with his parents but after his home is repaired Fikret is planning to finally move out.

loans.use: to perform repairs

loans.name: Safargeldi

texts.ru: Сафаргелди женат и любящий отец троих несовершеннолетних детей. Жена работает в колхозе. Он очень трудолюбивый человек. Более 7 лет он занимается купле- продажей крупного рогатого скота. В бизнесе помогает ему младший брат. Он хочет расширить свой бизнес и улучшить свои жилищные условия. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки крупного рогатого скота и корма для них. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Safargeldi is married and a father to three underage children. His wife works for the farming cooperative. Safargeldi is a very hardworking man. For more then seven years he has been raising and reselling cattle. His younger brother assists him with the animals. Safargeldi wants to expand his business and improve his living conditions. For this reason he is taking out a loan of 10000 somoni to purchase more cattle and fodder for them. Safargeldi is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy cattle and fodder for them

loans.name: Alvaro Elias

texts.es:
Alvaro es una persona que es reconocida entre sus familiares y las personas de su sector por ser muy trabajador y muy dedicado a su hijo. Alvaro es un padre soltero que tiene a cargo su hijo de 14 años, por el que siempre lucha y trabaja fuertemente.
Alvaro se dedica a la comercialización de todo tipo de mercancía como es ropa, zapatos, tendidos de cama, cobija, entre otros, y gracias a esto genera los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hijo.
Alvaro compra la mercancía en diferentes partes, y las vende en otros municipios, por lo que constantemente esta viajando. 
Alvaro es muy conocido entre sus clientes por vender productos de muy buena calidad, y por ofrecer un servicio que siempre es el mejor. Es por esto que Alvaro tiene una clientela fija, y muy a menudo intenta conquistar clientes nuevos, para poder así aumentar sus ingresos.
Actualmente Alvaro tiene grandes pedidos de sus clientes, por lo que debe comprar la mercancía para cumplir con estos pedidos, sin embargo, Alvaro no cuenta con el capital necesario para la compra de esta mercancía, por lo que tiene la esperanza de que un crédito le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de mercancía como ropa, zapatos, tendidos de cama, cobijas, entre otros productos, para poder así cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes y seguir obteniendo ingresos para poder sostener los gastos del hogar.
Alvaro tiene el gran sueño de que su hijo pueda acceder a una buena educación, y en un futuro poderle brindar la oportunidad de acceder a una educación universitaria donde se prepare y pueda conseguir un empleo bien remunerado.
texts.en:
Alvaro is known by his relatives and the people in his area as a very hard-working person who is very dedicated to his son. He is the single father of a 14-year-old boy for whom he struggles and works very hard.
Alvaro works selling all sorts of merchandise, such as clothes, shoes, bed sheets and blankets, among others, and thanks to this work, he gets enough money to support his son.
Alvaro buys the merchandise in different places and sells it in other districts, so that he is always travelling. 
He is very well known among his clients for selling very good quality products and always offering the best kind of service. It is for this reason that he has regular customers. However, he also tries to get new ones very often in order to increase his income.
Alvaro’s customers have currently placed many orders and he needs to buy the merchandise to be able to fulfill them. He does not have the necessary capital to buy the goods, however, so he hopes that a loan will make it possible to buy merchandise such as clothes, shoes, bed sheets and blankets, among other products, and so fulfill his customers’ orders and continue to obtain an income that will allow him to cover his home expenses.
Alvaro dreams that his son may be able to access a good education and even that he will be able to pay a university education for him so that he can get a well-paid job.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as clothes, shoes, blankets and sheets, among others.

loans.name: Kiyomidin

texts.ru: Киёмидин женат и ответственный отец троих детей. Более 6 лет он занимается выращиванием сельскохозяйственных культур. Жена занимается домохозяйством. В основном он выращивает лук на 0,80 гектарах земли. С ним работает его брат. Запрашивает займ для покупки минеральных удобрений и оплаты рабочих сил. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Kiyomidin is married and a responsible father of three children. He has been farming for more then six years while his wife takes care of the house. Kiyomidin primarily grows onions on 0.8 hectares/2 acres of land and his brother assists him. This loan will allow Kiyomidin to purchase fertilizer and to pay workers. He hopes for your help and kindness.

loans.use: To buy mineral fertilizer

loans.name: Islomjon

texts.ru: Исломджон женат и любящий отец троих детей. Жена занимается пошивом женских платьев и халатов на дому. А Исломджон производит мебель, в основном диваны и кресла, а также занимается ремонтом мебели. В бизнесе с 1995 году. Раньше производил мебель и ремонтировал в городе Душанбе, в данное время работает в Худжанде. В несезонный период занимается строительством домов на заказ. Исломджон хотел бы получить займ для покупки сырья такие как ламинат, ДСП и доски для производства мебели.
texts.en: Islomjon is married and a loving father of three children. His wife sews women's clothing and robes from home.
